T03D3811:1b-1: bha ga wa ty'a ma n'a y'a nu s'a ri ni n'a ma by'a khy'am /
T03D3811:1b-3: bcom ldan 'das ma'i man ngag gi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa /
T03D3811:1b-4: 'phags pa [dd] shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3811:1b-5: gang la kun rtog dang ni rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo spang byas te //
T03D3811:1b-6: gzugs la sogs pa yang ni de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig smra //
T03D3811:1b-7: rtag pa la sogs nye bar bzlog pa'i dbang gis mngon par dga' ba yis //
T03D3811:1b-8: bdud sdang ba yi mchog gi yum de la 'dir bdag nyid kun nas 'dud //
T03D3811:1b-9: gang zhig sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum //
T03D3811:1b-10: brgyad stong pa 'di bdag gis ni //
T03D3811:1b-11: sngon gyi man ngag rjes 'brangs nas //
T03D3811:1b-12: 'di yi rnam bshad brtsam par bya //
T03D3811:1b-13: thub pa'i rgyal po'i yum 'di mgon po byams pa las //
T03D3811:1b-14: 'phags pa'i lam ni thob pa thogs med ces byas 'dir //
T03D3811:1b-15: don ni gang zhig thob gyur de ni bdag gis sbyar //
T03D3811:1b-16: thal sbyar gsol 'debs don du bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam //
T03D3811:2a-0: grogs ngan bor la lam ngan rnams la rgyal po'i lam du 'khrul pa mi byed @2a * //
T03D3811:2a-2: bdag gis gom gzhag rjes su gom pa rnam par
T03D3811:2a-3: bkod nas lam bzang dag la bu khyed shog /
T03D3811:2a-4: gang dang gang du yang ni ring nas 'byung ba
T03D3811:2a-5: bdag gis gang du dka' bas ngo mtshar ba //
T03D3811:2a-6: dam pa tshad mar gyur pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i zhabs kyi dgod pa 'di ni mchog tu blang //
T03D3811:2a-7: bskal ba bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
T03D3811:2a-8: gzugs kyi sku dang dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs bsrung
T03D3811:2a-9: bar rtogs pa'i phyir 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje
T03D3811:2a-10: byang chub sems dpa' chen po la 'khor gyi nang
T03D3811:2a-12: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya bas shes
T03D3811:2a-13: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa 'di
T03D3811:2a-14: bdag gis thos pa yin par 'phags pa byams pa
T03D3811:2a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad bshad do zhes ci'i phyir ma brjod ce na /
T03D3811:2a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rngom brjod 'di rang gi yul ma yin pa'i phyir te /
T03D3811:2a-18: gang gi phyir de ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyis
T03D3811:2a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las gsungs pa'i
T03D3811:2a-20: rim pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod
T03D3811:2a-21: yul mthar thug pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3811:2a-22: sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i gdul bya'i rigs sna tshogs
T03D3811:2a-23: pa'i lhag par mos pa dang /
T03D3811:2a-24: lta ba sna tshogs pas tha dad par gyur pa
T03D3811:2a-25: rnams la sna tshogs pa'i skad kyis sna tshogs pa'i
T03D3811:2b-0: don rnams skad cig ma @2b gcig la nye bar
T03D3811:2b-1: rjes su ston par mdzad de /
T03D3811:2b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdul bya rnams la ston par
T03D3811:2b-3: byed pa'i rim pa de ni rnam pa thams cad
T03D3811:2b-4: du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul ma
T03D3811:2b-5: yin no // spyod yul du gang gyur pa yin
T03D3811:2b-6: pa de yang sdud pa'i go rims kyis bshad par
T03D3811:2b-7: nus pa de'i phyir chos sdud par rung ba dang
T03D3811:2b-8: bdag nyid kyi spyod yul chos ston pa'i go rims
T03D3811:2b-9: yin no // gzhan bzung nas / 'di skad bdag
T03D3811:2b-10: gis thos pa zhes bya bas bdag nyid kyi rna
T03D3811:2b-11: ba'i lam du 'ongs pa'i rim pa so sor ston
T03D3811:2b-13: bstan pa'i mthar yang de skad ces bka' stsal nas
T03D3811:2b-14: zhes bya ba nas nye bar sdud par byed pa
T03D3811:2b-15: yin gyi 'di skad bka' stsal zhes bya ba ni
T03D3811:2b-16: ma yin no // gzhan du yang sangs rgyas bcom
T03D3811:2b-17: ldan 'das rnams ni ngag gis gzhan rnams la chos
T03D3811:2b-18: ston par mdzad pa ni ma yin te /
T03D3811:2b-19: gang gi phyir don dam pa ni brjod par bya
T03D3811:2b-20: ba ma yin la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni
T03D3811:2b-21: rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
T03D3811:2b-22: rnam par mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pa ste /
T03D3811:2b-23: 'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang sems
T03D3811:2b-24: can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis ji lta ji
T03D3811:2b-25: ltar gdul bya rnams rang rang gi skad rnams kyis
T03D3811:2b-26: chos ston pa nges par 'byung bar yang dag par
T03D3811:2b-28: chos kyi sku'i dbang gis byung bas dam pa'i chos
T03D3811:2b-29: la gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir nye bar sdud pa'i
T03D3811:2b-30: mthar bstan pa la de ltar 'jug pa yin la
T03D3811:2b-31: / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bshad pa yin no //
T03D3811:2b-32: slar mdo sde 'ga' zhig las 'jig rten pa dag
T03D3811:2b-33: pa'i rnam par rtog pa la mngon du phyogs par
T03D3811:2b-34: byed pa'i phyir yang chos ston pa bshad par mdzad
T03D3811:2b-35: pa yin te / phyogs de la 'di skad ces
T03D3811:2b-36: bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni gtso bo kho
T03D3811:2b-37: pa yin te / na yin no // dus gcig
T03D3811:2b-38: na zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung ba'i dus
T03D3811:2b-39: na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3811:2b-40: ci'i phyir dus nges pa ma mdzad ce na /
T03D3811:2b-41: dgos pa med pa'i phyir te /
T03D3811:2b-42: zla ba 'di 'am zhag 'di la bstan par mdzad
T03D3811:2b-43: ces bya ba'i tha tshig la dgos pa cung zad
T03D3811:2b-44: kyang yod pa ma yin te /
T03D3811:2b-45: dgos pa med pa ni bshad par mi rigs so //
T03D3811:2b-46: gnas bstan pa ni rigs pa yin te /
T03D3811:2b-47: mchod rten gyi gnas yin pa'i phyir sems can rnams
T03D3811:2b-48: kyi mchod pa dang phyag btsal ba la sogs pas
T03D3811:2b-49: tshogs bsags pa'i don du ste /
T03D3811:3a-0: rtsod pa med pa'i don du @3a * //
T03D3811:3a-1: yang dus kyi nges pa bshad pa ma yin no //
T03D3811:3a-2: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni skad cig thang
T03D3811:3a-3: cig yud tsam de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi
T03D3811:3a-4: khams sna tshogs pa dang gdul bya sna tshogs pa
T03D3811:3a-5: rnams la bstan pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis sgrub
T03D3811:3a-6: par byed pa mthong ba yin te /
T03D3811:3a-7: gal te de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus par gyur na /
T03D3811:3a-8: de bzhin du nyi ma 'di dang yul gzhan la
T03D3811:3a-9: bdag cag gi de na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs
T03D3811:3a-10: so zhes brjod pa skyed pa yin te /
T03D3811:3a-11: de lta bur 'gyur gyis 'jig pa thams cad du
T03D3811:3a-12: yang dag par sdud par byed pa rnams kyis dus
T03D3811:3a-13: kyi nges pa ma mdzad do //
T03D3811:3a-14: yang na rgyal po'i khab tu lan mang du bzhugs
T03D3811:3a-15: pa'i phyir rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs pa'i dus gcig
T03D3811:3a-16: na zhes bshad par bzhed nas dus gcig na zhes
T03D3811:3a-17: bya ba'i tshig smos par sbyar ro //
T03D3811:3a-18: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bdud bzhi bcom pa dang ldan pa'am /
T03D3811:3a-19: yang na 'di la legs pa mnga' bas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o //
T03D3811:3a-20: rgya zhes bya ba'i rkyen dang rgyus byed pa nyid kho na ste /
T03D3811:3a-21: byed pa nyid kyis brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:3a-22: de rnams kyang dbang phyug la sogs pa rnam pa drug yin te /
T03D3811:3a-23: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang //
T03D3811:3a-24: dpal dang grags dag ye shes dang //
T03D3811:3a-25: brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs ldan pa //
T03D3811:3a-26: drug po 'di la bcom zhes thos //
T03D3811:3a-27: de'i phyir dbang phyug thams cad dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T03D3811:3a-28: de la dbang phyug ni gzhan dbang ma yin pa ste /
T03D3811:3a-29: de bcom ldan 'das la tshang bas bag chags dang
T03D3811:3a-30: bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir ro
T03D3811:3a-31: // bcom ldan 'das la gzugs tshang ba ste /
T03D3811:3a-32: gong na med pa'i mtshan rnams dang dpe byad bzang
T03D3811:3a-33: po thams cad kyis rnam par mdzes pa'i sku nyid
T03D3811:3a-36: phyogs dang mtshams su sgras rnam par grags pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:3a-37: phun sum tshogs pa gang gis mang po rnams kyi rten du gyur pa de ni dpal te /
T03D3811:3a-38: de yang bcom ldan 'das la tshang ba dang /
T03D3811:3a-39: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum
T03D3811:3a-40: tshogs pa thams cad 'dod pa rnams kyis brten par
T03D3811:3a-41: bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:3a-42: ye shes tshang ba ste rnam pa thams cad du shes bya thams cad chags pa med pa dang /
T03D3811:3b-0: @3b thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:3b-2: rnam pa thams cad du gzhan gyi don la rtag tu mdzad pa rgyun ma chad pa'o //
T03D3811:3b-4: gang du zhe na rgyal po'i khab tu zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:3b-5: rgyal po'i khab tu zhes bya ba ni ma ga dh'a pa rnams kyi grong khyer ro //
T03D3811:3b-6: ji ltar rgyal po'i khab ces brjod ce na /
T03D3811:3b-7: sngon rol pa'i lha zhes bya ba'i rgyal po byung
T03D3811:3b-8: bar gyur pa des mchod sbyin yang dag par brtsams
T03D3811:3b-9: pa dang drang srong brgya phrag lnga dang bram ze
T03D3811:3b-10: brgya phrag lnga tshogs par gyur to //
T03D3811:3b-11: de la mchod sbyin bya snyam du bsams pa dang
T03D3811:3b-12: ra rnams kyis mchod sbyin bya'o zhes bya ba ni
T03D3811:3b-13: rig byed las 'don pa yin te /
T03D3811:3b-14: de la bram ze rnams kyis smras pa /
T03D3811:3b-15: ra rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni ra'i phyugs rnams kyis mchod sbyin bya'o //
T03D3811:3b-16: drang srong rnams kyis smras pa /
T03D3811:3b-17: rva rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni ma btsugs par
T03D3811:3b-18: skye ba'i chos can gyi nas la sogs pa rnams
T03D3811:3b-19: kyis mchod sbyin bya zhes zer ro //
T03D3811:3b-20: dus de'i tshe nor gyi dog pa zhes bya ba
T03D3811:3b-21: mchog tu rgyal ma'i grong khyer gyi rgyal po ste
T03D3811:3b-22: / de yang rig byed thams cad kyi don la
T03D3811:3b-23: mkhas pa de tshad mar bya'o zhes rtsod pa las
T03D3811:3b-24: gnyi ga yang der song bar gyur pa dang /
T03D3811:3b-25: gal te kho bo cag gi phyogs gtso bor mi
T03D3811:3b-26: byed na de'i tshe khyod dmod pa'i mes thal bar
T03D3811:3b-27: bya'o zhes nor gyi dog pa de bram ze rnams
T03D3811:3b-29: bram ze rnams kyi phyogs kho na gtso bor byas par gyur te /
T03D3811:3b-30: sdig pa des yang seng ge'i khri las ltung bar
T03D3811:3b-31: sa gzhi yang gas nas der zhugs par gyur to
T03D3811:3b-32: // de'i phyir bram ze rnams ni mchod sbyin la
T03D3811:3b-33: sogs pa'i phrin las la sa gzhi la gtsang gtor
T03D3811:3b-34: // byas te / bu longs shig ces bya ba 'don par byed do //
T03D3811:3b-35: rgyal po de'i bu rgyal ba'i shing rta zhes bya
T03D3811:3b-36: ba de blon po rnams kyis song ste sa sbyongs
T03D3811:3b-38: rgyal ba'i shing rta la rmi lam du lha mos gsungs pa /
T03D3811:3b-39: gang g'a brgal nas ha cang yang mi ring ba
T03D3811:3b-40: na ri bo lnga yod de dbus na mtsho yod
T03D3811:3b-41: pa der grong khyer brtsig par bya ste /
T03D3811:3b-42: der ni khyod kyi rgyal srid de ji srid du
T03D3811:3b-43: rgyal ba'i shing rtas kyang thams cad du de bzhin
T03D3811:3b-44: du byas nas grong khyer yang btsugs so //
T03D3811:3b-45: 'on kyang der ni mi ma yin rnams rgyal po'i khab dor nas /
T03D3811:4a-2: de nas rgyal pos lcags ris kyis yongs su bskor
T03D3811:4a-3: nas 'di dag thams cad bdag gi khyim zhes smras
T03D3811:4a-4: so // deng phyin chad ma bshig pas des na rgyal po'i khab po //
T03D3811:4a-5: rgyal po'i khab de la bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni la ta ste /
T03D3811:4a-6: ti sma sbyar bas lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa la la ta'o //
T03D3811:4a-7: thun mong du ni mnyam par bzhag pa'i lus dang
T03D3811:4a-8: ngag dang yid kyi rang bzhin bzhugs pa rnams so
T03D3811:4a-9: // khyad par du ni sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3811:4a-10: spyod lam gyis bzhugs pa dang /
T03D3811:4a-11: chos ston pas bzhugs pa dang /
T03D3811:4a-12: mnyam par gzhag pas bzhugs pa dang /
T03D3811:4a-13: nang du yang dag 'jog la bzhugs pa'o //
T03D3811:4a-14: de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku'i phrin las thams cad ni dang po ste /
T03D3811:4a-15: ngag gi phrin las thams cad ni gnyis pa'o //
T03D3811:4a-16: gang zhig rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag pa dang
T03D3811:4a-17: gang zhig ting nge 'dzin la mngon du phyogs par
T03D3811:4a-18: byed pa la thugs kyi phrin las de gnyi ga
T03D3811:4a-19: gsum pa'o // gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sems can rnams la gzigs pa dang /
T03D3811:4a-20: lha la sogs pa nye bar bsdu ba'i phyir thugs kyi phrin las de gnyi ga ni bzhi pa'o //
T03D3811:4a-21: rgyal po'i khab na yang sa phyogs gang du bzhugs she na /
T03D3811:4a-23: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:4a-24: khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'i phyogs gnyis bsdu ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3811:4a-25: gzugs kyi sku dang chos kyi skus phan 'dogs par bstan pa'i phyir gnyis smos so //
T03D3811:4a-26: nyan pa po rnams kyang ston pa 'di la ring
T03D3811:4a-27: po nas mngon par lhags pa nyid mtshon pa'i don
T03D3811:4a-28: du yang bya rgod kyi phung po smos pa yin
T03D3811:4a-29: no // 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
T03D3811:4a-30: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3811:4a-32: yon tan gyi che ba nyid kyi phyir dge slong zhes bya'o //
T03D3811:4a-33: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rang gi ngo
T03D3811:4a-34: bo'i dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par 'byung
T03D3811:4a-35: bas dge slong zhes brjod pa yin te /
T03D3811:4a-36: dge slong gi sdom pa yang rnam pa bcus skyed pa yin zhes 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams so //
T03D3811:4a-37: rang 'byung gi ye shes yang dag par 'byung bas
T03D3811:4b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @4b rnams dang rang sangs
T03D3811:4b-1: rgyas rnams so // 'ga' zhig 'phags pa'i lam yang dag par 'byung bas dang /
T03D3811:4b-2: gzhan rnams la tshur shog gi sgo nas bsnyen par rdzogs pas dang /
T03D3811:4b-3: skyabs su 'gro bas sde pa bzang po drug cu'i tshogs dang /
T03D3811:4b-4: ston pa nyid du khas blangs pas 'phags pa 'od srungs dang /
T03D3811:4b-5: pho nyas mchod sbyin ma dang lci ba'i chos khas
T03D3811:4b-6: blangs pas 'phags ma goo t'a mi la sogs pa
T03D3811:4b-7: rnams la yang / las brjod pa gsum dang gsol
T03D3811:4b-8: ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang
T03D3811:4b-9: mi phyed pa lnga bas de ring gi bar du'o
T03D3811:4b-10: rnams la yang / // ji ltar srid pa dge
T03D3811:4b-11: slong de rnams kyi dge 'dun ni tshogs kyis so
T03D3811:4b-12: rnams la yang / // // de ji ltar dge 'dun zhe na /
T03D3811:4b-13: mi phyed pa nyid kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:4b-14: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T03D3811:4b-15: bye ba brgya yi bdud kyis kyang //
T03D3811:4b-16: gang phyir dbye bar mi nus pas //
T03D3811:4b-17: de phyir dge 'dun zhes su brjod //
T03D3811:4b-18: thabs cig ces bya ba ni lhan cig ces bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:4b-19: sngar chen po zhes bya bas spyir bshad pa byas nas khyad par du grangs bshad par bya'o //
T03D3811:4b-20: dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i zhes bya ba
T03D3811:4b-21: ni phyed kyis rdzogs pa'i brgya phrag bcu gsum la
T03D3811:4b-22: dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'o //
T03D3811:4b-23: yon tan gyi che ba nyid gsungs pa /
T03D3811:4b-24: thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:4b-25: dgra ni nyon mongs pa rnams la de rnams bcom pas na dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3811:4b-26: aa re zhes bya ba la ae yig phyi bas
T03D3811:4b-27: han te zhes bya ba la tre ka gi rkyen
T03D3811:4b-28: yang nges pa'i tshig can no //
T03D3811:4b-29: yang na bcom pa ste slar yang rgas pa med pas de'i phyir dgra bcom pa'o //
T03D3811:4b-30: yang na lha dang mi rnams las /
T03D3811:4b-31: mchod pa dang yon len bar gyur pas na dgra bcom pa ste /
T03D3811:4b-32: 'dis ni sbyin gnas kyi yon tan gsungs pa yin no //
T03D3811:4b-33: zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba ni zag par
T03D3811:4b-34: byed pa nyon mongs pa rnams dang dge ba'i rtsa
T03D3811:4b-35: ba yang skyed par byed pas na zag pa ni
T03D3811:4b-39: ma rig pa'i zag pa dang /
T03D3811:4b-40: lta ba'i zag pa zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:4b-41: de rnams kyang rim pa ji lta bar 'dod pa lnga dang /
T03D3811:4b-42: srid pa gsum lhan cig skyed pa dang kun tu brtags pa'i ma rig pa dang /
T03D3811:4b-43: lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis su son pa de
T03D3811:4b-44: rnams 'di rnams la zag pas na zag pa zad
T03D3811:5a-1: mi slob pa'i tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung pos 'dod pa'i zag pa zad pa dang /
T03D3811:5a-2: mi slob pa'i shes rab kyi phung pos lta ba'i zag pa zad pa dang /
T03D3811:5a-3: mi slob pa'i rnam par grol pa'i phung pos srid pa'i zag pa zad pa dang /
T03D3811:5a-4: mi slob pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong

T03D3811:69b-7: rnams yongs su 'dzin par bya ba dang /
T03D3811:69b-8: bskyed par bya ba dman pa rnams la yang 'jig par bya /
T03D3811:69b-9: gzhan du na bslab pa ni mtshang bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:69b-10: de ci'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa rnams la yongs
T03D3811:69b-11: su 'dzin pa dang dor ba'i phyir slob par mi
T03D3811:69b-12: byed ces brjod snyam du dgongs nas gsungs pa /
T03D3811:69b-13: chos 'ga' zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:69b-14: 'ga' zhig tu ni skye ba'i phyir yang ma yin zhes bya ba 'don pa ma yin te /
T03D3811:69b-15: gang gi tshe 'ga' zhig tu chos gang gis kyang
T03D3811:69b-16: yongs su 'dzin pa la sogs pa yod pa ma
T03D3811:69b-17: yin pa de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
T03D3811:69b-18: don yang yod pa ma yin zhes gsungs pa thams
T03D3811:69b-19: cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3811:69b-20: pa ste / byang chub sems dpa' ni dman pa'i
T03D3811:69b-21: chos rnams yongs su dor nas khyad par can rnams
T03D3811:69b-23: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang 'gag
T03D3811:69b-24: pa dag yod pa la rnam pa 'di yod pa
T03D3811:69b-25: yin no / rab tu dbye ba yod pa ma
T03D3811:69b-26: yin chos nyid kyi gzugs la sogs pa rnams la
T03D3811:69b-27: skye ba dang 'gag pa dag yod pa ma yin
T03D3811:69b-28: ngo bo nyid kyis g-yo ba dang bral ba'i phyir
T03D3811:69b-30: gzhan dbang gi ngo bo nyid rnams la yang shin tu med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3811:69b-31: gal te de ltar yin na ji ltar byang byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa zhes gsungs pa /
T03D3811:69b-32: de ltar slob pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:69b-33: de ltar zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i sbyor
T03D3811:69b-34: bas gang zhig slob par byed pa de nyid ni
T03D3811:69b-35: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar
T03D3811:69b-36: 'gyur ro // sh'a ri'i bus dri bar byed pa ni /
T03D3811:69b-37: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:69b-38: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing zhes bya
T03D3811:69b-39: ba ni ji ltar slob ces bya ba'i don to
T03D3811:69b-40: // rab 'byor gyi lan ni de de bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:69b-41: de de bzhin te ni ji ltar bshad par bya ba de ltar de zhes bya ba'i don te //
T03D3811:70a-1: dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:70a-2: gang nyid chos thams cad mi dmigs pas spyod pa
T03D3811:70a-3: rnam par sbyong bar byed pa de nyid kyis thams
T03D3811:70a-4: cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub par byed pa yin zhes
T03D3811:70a-6: de ltar lam gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3811:70a-7: nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3811:70a-8: 'dir bstan pa'i phyir gang zhig rnam pa thams cad
T03D3811:70a-9: mkhyen pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3811:70a-10: phyin pa de la dri bar byed pa ni gang
T03D3811:70a-11: las btsal bar bya zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:70a-12: rab 'byor gyi le'u las zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:70a-13: gang zhig 'di bar ma shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3811:70a-14: tu phyin pa'i bstan pa de rab 'byor gyi le'u
T03D3811:70a-15: las shes par bya bar brjod do //
T03D3811:70a-16: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shes rab
T03D3811:70a-17: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te 'jug
T03D3811:70a-18: pa'i phyir de bstan pa la de las btsal bar
T03D3811:70a-19: bya zhes bya bar brjod do //
T03D3811:70a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul zab pa bstan pa
T03D3811:70a-21: la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las brtsams
T03D3811:70a-22: te rab 'byor gyi bsngags pa mi dpyod cing lha'i
T03D3811:70a-23: dbang pos dri bar byed de /
T03D3811:70a-24: su'i mthu zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:70a-25: gang gi phyir bstan pa de sngar gnas skabs su byas pa de'i phyir sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
T03D3811:70a-26: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:70a-28: gal te yang rab 'byor gyi le'u nyid la gsungs
T03D3811:70a-29: pa de lta na yang lha'i 'dus pa da ltar
T03D3811:70a-30: 'jug pa'i phyir de'i tshe na brgya byin zhes bya
T03D3811:70a-31: ba'i dri ba yang dag par 'byung ba yod pa
T03D3811:70a-32: ma yin no // 'di nyid bstan par byed pa'i
T03D3811:70a-33: phyir rab 'byor rjes su sems par byed cing gsungs
T03D3811:70a-34: ma yin no // pa / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:70a-35: de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi tshul
T03D3811:70a-36: gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs las bdag nyid
T03D3811:70a-37: kyis bstan pa byas par 'gyur zhes bya ba bstan
T03D3811:70a-38: par mdzad do // da ni don dam pa'i tshul gyis gsungs pa /
T03D3811:70a-39: gzugs las btsal bar mi bya zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:70a-40: gzugs la sogs pa rnams med pa brjod pa'o //
T03D3811:70a-41: gzugs las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya zhes
T03D3811:70a-42: bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3811:70a-43: pa la yang med pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad
T03D3811:70a-44: pa yod pa ma yin zhes tha dad pa med
T03D3811:70a-47: gzugs ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:70b-0: gzugs dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyi ga yang @70b med pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
T03D3811:70b-1: gzugs las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:70b-2: med pa nyid kyis tha dad par brjod par nus pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
T03D3811:70b-3: de ltar yang chos thams cad la stong pa nyid
T03D3811:70b-4: kyi ngo bo bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
T03D3811:70b-5: gyis brlabs pa dang rab 'byor gyi le'u la yang
T03D3811:70b-6: stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bstan par byas
T03D3811:70b-7: pa'o // de ltar yang don dam par stong pa nyid kho na la byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T03D3811:70b-8: stong pa nyid kho na las btsal ba dang de'i
T03D3811:70b-9: bstan pa la stong pa nyid las brtsams nas 'jug
T03D3811:70b-10: pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:70b-11: yang 'og tu brgya byin rnam pa bzhis ngag bstan
T03D3811:70b-12: pa sna tshogs pa nyid gnas skabs su yang nye
T03D3811:70b-13: bar bkod par byed pa ni pha rol tu phyin
T03D3811:70b-14: pa chen po'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste
T03D3811:70b-15: / brgya byin gyis bstan pa'i don la gnas brtan
T03D3811:70b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rab 'byor gyi bsngags
T03D3811:70b-17: pa dang bcas pa rjes su brjod pa ste /
T03D3811:70b-18: de bas na rab 'byor nyid kyis bstan pa'o //
T03D3811:70b-19: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:70b-20: gzugs kyi yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid can 'das
T03D3811:70b-21: pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i
T03D3811:70b-22: dus gsum la yod par 'gyur ram med par 'gyur
T03D3811:70b-23: zhes bya ba'am 'byung bar 'gyur ram 'byung bar mi
T03D3811:70b-24: 'gyur zhes bya ba'am yod dam med ces bya ba
T03D3811:70b-25: yongs su gcod pa med pa'i phyir chen po nyid
T03D3811:70b-26: de / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3811:70b-27: tu phyin pa la yang yongs su grub pa'i mtshan
T03D3811:70b-28: nyid can la chen po nyid de /
T03D3811:70b-29: tshad ma med pa nyid ni 'di tsam du yongs su gcod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:70b-30: tshad med pa nyid ni grangs kyis yongs su gcod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:70b-31: mtha' yas pa nyid ni mtshan nyid kyis yongs su gcod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:70b-32: po ti kha cig rnams la ni de ci'i phyir
T03D3811:70b-33: zhe na zhes bya ba 'di'i rjes la gzugs mtha'
T03D3811:70b-34: yas pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3811:70b-36: 'don pa de yang gang gis kyang ma bshad pa
T03D3811:70b-37: de bas na 'dri mkhan gyis bag med pa kho
T03D3811:70b-38: na'o // de lta bas na yang shes rab kyi
T03D3811:70b-39: pha rol tu phyin pa chen po nyi la sogs
T03D3811:70b-40: pa la gal te mngon par zhen pa yin na
T03D3811:70b-41: de'i tshe chen po nyid la sogs pa med ces
T03D3811:71a-1: du pha rol tu phyin pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la'o //
T03D3811:71a-2: yang rab tu dbye ba gnyis kyis mtha' yas pa nyid gsungs pa /
T03D3811:71a-3: dmigs pa mtha' yas pa nyid dang /
T03D3811:71a-4: sems can mtha' yas pa nyid kyis so //
T03D3811:71a-5: yang ci ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:71a-6: chos thams cad kyi zhes bya bas ni don dam
T03D3811:71a-7: par chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las mtha' med
T03D3811:71a-8: ces bya ba snga ma skye ba'i mtha'o //
T03D3811:71a-9: dbus ma yin zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma'i gnas pa'o //
T03D3811:71a-10: tha ma med ces bya ba ni 'gag pa'i mtha' ni ma yin no //
T03D3811:71a-11: 'di rnams la yang mi dmigs pa ni chos thams
T03D3811:71a-12: cad la stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i
T03D3811:71a-13: phyir ro // de ltar mtha' la sogs pa mi
T03D3811:71a-14: dmigs pas chos thams cad la yongs su grub pa
T03D3811:71a-15: nyid kyis mtha' yas pa nyid rab tu bstan nas
T03D3811:71a-16: phyir ro // / da ni kun brtags dang gzhan
T03D3811:71a-17: dbang gi ngo bo nyid kyis kyang bstan par bya
T03D3811:71a-19: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:71a-20: thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma med pas gsungs
T03D3811:71a-21: pa yang sems can mtha' yas pa nyid la brgya
T03D3811:71a-22: byin grangs kyis yang sems can mtha' yas pa nyid
T03D3811:71a-23: rang bzhin du byed cing dri bar byed pa ni
T03D3811:71a-24: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T03D3811:71a-25: bgrang ba dang mi ldan pa 'am bgrang ba mang
T03D3811:71a-26: pos zhes bya ba ni grangs las 'da' ba nyid
T03D3811:71a-27: kyis ma yin te mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i
T03D3811:71a-28: grangs kyis kyang ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to
T03D3811:71a-29: // 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:71a-30: 'o na'i sbra ni mi bzod pa la'o //
T03D3811:71a-31: chos gang gi tshig bla dvags yin zhes bya ba la /
T03D3811:71a-32: chos rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi tshig
T03D3811:71a-33: bla dvags ma yin te de rnams med pa'i phyir
T03D3811:71a-34: ro // chos med pa'i tshig bla dvags kyang ma
T03D3811:71a-35: yin zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa las
T03D3811:71a-36: tha dad pa'i bdag med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:71a-37: brtags pa zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa rnams kyis rab tu sbyar ba'o //
T03D3811:71a-39: gang gi phyir glo bur ba ste /
T03D3811:71a-40: don dam par nges par dpyad pa yod pa la de med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:71a-41: gang gi phyir dngos po med pa gzugs la sogs
T03D3811:71b-0: pa'i mtshan nyid dang bdag gi mtshan @71b nyid kyi
T03D3811:71b-2: bdag dang 'brel bas cung zad bdag gi zhes brjod
T03D3811:71b-3: de de yang med pa ste bdag shin tu yang
T03D3811:71b-4: med pas na de'i phyir bdag gi ba med pa'o
T03D3811:71b-6: de med pas dmigs su med pa'o //
T03D3811:71b-7: gal te bstan pa 'di la sems can 'ga' zhig
T03D3811:71b-8: bstan par gyur na de ltar yod na sems can
T03D3811:71b-9: mtha' yas pa nyid kyang bstan par 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:71b-10: gang gi phyir ngo bo nyid kyis sems can med
T03D3811:71b-11: pa'i phyir sems can bstan du med pa de'i phyir
T03D3811:71b-12: 'dir sems can mtha' yas pa nyid don dam par
T03D3811:71b-15: 'di ji snyam du sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:71b-16: sems can mtha' yas pa yod dam zhes bya ba
T03D3811:71b-17: ni sems can med pa'i phyir sems can mtha' yas
T03D3811:71b-18: pa nyid kyang bstan pa med ces bya ba'i don
T03D3811:71b-19: to // 'og tu ni sems can mtha' yas pa
T03D3811:71b-20: nyid tshig la rag lus pa ma yin te sems
T03D3811:71b-21: can med pa nyid kyis mtha' yas pa nyid rang
T03D3811:71b-22: bzhin can zhes bstan par byed pa ni gal te
T03D3811:71b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T03D3811:71b-24: gsungs zhes bya ba ni tshig gis so //
T03D3811:71b-25: mtha' las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi rnam par rig
T03D3811:71b-26: par byed pa ni don shes par byed pa'i dbyangs
T03D3811:71b-27: ni sgra 'di la yod pa de ltar brjod pas
T03D3811:71b-28: so // de ltar na yang shin tu che ba
T03D3811:71b-29: nyid kyis zab mo dbyangs sil snyan gyi sgra bzhin
T03D3811:71b-30: du sna tshogs pa'i sgra 'di la yod pa de
T03D3811:71b-32: yang bzhugs zhes bya ba ni ngal mi so bas so //
T03D3811:71b-33: zin kyang zhes bya ba ni ci zhig go snyam na /
T03D3811:71b-34: don ni 'di yin te gal te tshig la rag
T03D3811:71b-35: lus pa sems can mtha' yas pa nyid du gyur
T03D3811:71b-36: na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis sems can skye
T03D3811:71b-38: gang gi phyir de ni yod pa ma yin pa
T03D3811:71b-39: de'i phyir sems can mtha' yas pa nyid kyi tshig
T03D3811:71b-40: las 'byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:71b-41: thog ma nas dag pa nyid ni dang po nyid nas so //
T03D3811:71b-42: yongs su dag pa nyid ni thams cad du yod pa nyid do //
T03D3811:71b-43: rnam grangs 'dis kyang ni rab tu dbye bas so //
T03D3811:71b-44: mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:72a-1: sems can bstan par 'gyur na de yod pa'i phyir mtha' rnams kyang yod par 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:72a-2: de rnams bstan pas mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:72a-3: de'i phyir sems can bstan pa ma yin no //
T03D3811:72a-4: de'i phyir sems can med de med pas mtha' yas pa yang med do //
T03D3811:72a-5: de bas na sems can ma bstan pa'i phyir mtha'
T03D3811:72a-6: yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zhes brjod
T03D3811:72a-7: pa yin zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
T03D3811:72a-8: 'di ni 'khor rnams kyi dang po'i khyad par dang
T03D3811:72a-9: shin tu ngo mtshar ba'i tshig smras pa de nas
T03D3811:72a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:72a-11: skye dgu'i bdag po rnams ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnam pa bzhi'o //
T03D3811:72a-12: khyad par gyi chos thos pas rab tu dga' ba'i
T03D3811:72a-13: phyir smras pa'i tshig ni ched du brjod pas de
T03D3811:72a-15: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba la'o //
T03D3811:72a-16: chos zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'i chos so //
T03D3811:72a-17: rab tu dga' ba dang ngo mtshar ba la tshig gnyis so //
T03D3811:72a-18: chos de nyid kyi chos nyid ni rang bzhin te de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba nyid do //
T03D3811:72a-19: de nyid kyi phyir smras pa /
T03D3811:72a-20: gang yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:72a-22: brjod cing de'i tshig las dang por cung zad gsal bar byed pa'o //
T03D3811:72a-23: de nas rim gyis shin tu gsal ba dang de
T03D3811:72a-24: bas gsal bar rtogs pa'i phyir bstan te bshad pa
T03D3811:72a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa legs par 'dzin to zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:72a-27: chos kyi sku ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin no //
T03D3811:72a-28: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang der slob par gyur
T03D3811:72a-29: pa na don dam par sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
T03D3811:72a-30: rang bzhin nyid ces de'i byang chub sems dpa' dang
T03D3811:72a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad med pa de
T03D3811:72a-32: bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid brjod par
T03D3811:72a-33: bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:72a-34: ma bral ba ni thob pa las yongs su ltung ba med pas so //
T03D3811:72a-35: gnas par 'gyur ni yang dag par phyogs pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:72a-36: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos
T03D3811:72a-37: rnams la yang nas yang du slob par gyur pa
T03D3811:72a-38: rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ngo bo nyid
T03D3811:72b-0: gsal @72b ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das sngar gyi
T03D3811:72b-2: gang gi tshe bdag ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:72b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyang sangs rgyas
T03D3811:72b-4: kyi chos rnams dang ma bral bar bdag la gzigs
T03D3811:72b-5: nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la lung bstan par
T03D3811:72b-6: mdzad pa yin zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:72b-7: 'dus ni 'dug pa dang 'dus pa dag go //
T03D3811:72b-8: dbus ni dril bu 'dogs pa'i lam ste de'i dbus su song ba'o //
T03D3811:72b-9: na so gzhon pa klog pa'i bram ze'i khye'u ste de'i bod pa ni bram ze'i khye'u zhes bya'o //
T03D3811:72b-10: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das ming gis brlan pa
T03D3811:72b-11: zhes bya ba dang blo rab tu gsal bas legs
T03D3811:72b-12: pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang rgyal po zas
T03D3811:72b-13: gtsang mas gzhon nu'i skye ba la don thams cad
T03D3811:72b-14: grub pa'i phyir don thams cad grub pa zhes mtshan
T03D3811:72b-15: btags so // gang gi phyir grong khyer du zhugs
T03D3811:72b-16: par byas pa de'i tshe sh'akya rnams shin tu dregs
T03D3811:72b-17: pa yang thub pa bzhin grub pa de bas na
T03D3811:72b-18: rgyal po gzhon nu'i mtshan gnyis pa sh'akya thub pa
T03D3811:72b-20: ji ltar chos rnams 'dis mngon par rdzogs par sangs
T03D3811:72b-21: rgyas pa de bzhin du gsungs pa'i phyir de bzhin
T03D3811:72b-22: gshegs pa'o // ga ta zhes bya ba la aa nyid dang nges tshig pa nga yig go //
T03D3811:72b-23: dgra rnams ni nyon mongs pa rnams te de rnams 'joms pas na dgra bcom pa'o //
T03D3811:72b-24: ji lta ba bzhin du don dam par chos rnams
T03D3811:72b-25: rtogs pas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T03D3811:72b-26: so // 'dis ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3811:72b-27: gang gi phyir smra ba po ma yin pa dang

T03D3811:92a-30: 'dud pa byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bstod
T03D3811:92a-31: pa sngon du 'gro bas phyag 'tshal bar byas pas
T03D3811:92a-32: so // lha rnams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa drug dang /
T03D3811:92a-33: bsam gtan dang po la tshangs ris la sogs pa gsum mo //
T03D3811:92a-34: gnyis pa la 'od chung la sogs pa gsum mo //
T03D3811:92a-35: gsum pa la dge chung la sogs pa'o //
T03D3811:92a-36: bzhi pa la sprin med la sogs pa brgyad dang /
T03D3811:92a-38: 'bras bu che ba'i phyogs gcig las byung ba'o //
T03D3811:92a-39: de rnams kyi yang sngon gyi smon lam las der nye bar 'ong ba'o //
T03D3811:92a-40: lta bar gyur pa la sogs pa ni de rnams la med ces smra ba'o //
T03D3811:92a-41: snang ba chen po dag mthong na //
T03D3811:92b-0: mar me la @92b sogs pa las lhag pa'i snang
T03D3811:92b-1: ba dang yang dag par shes pa zhes mtshon par
T03D3811:92b-2: byed pa ni nges par bya ba la nges par
T03D3811:92b-3: zhes bya ba'o // shes par bya ba'o //
T03D3811:92b-4: mi'am zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o //
T03D3811:92b-5: 'ongs shing zhes bya ba ni sa phyogs su 'gro bas so //
T03D3811:92b-6: lhags pa zhes bya ba ni khyim la sogs par rab tu zhugs pas so //
T03D3811:92b-7: mi ma yin pa'i dri zhes bya ba ni mi rnams las byung bas na mi'i'o //
T03D3811:92b-8: de ltar ma yin pa ni mi ma yin pa'i'o //
T03D3811:92b-9: gzob par 'gyur ba ni yid du 'ong ba nyid kyis so //
T03D3811:92b-10: gtsang ma zhes bya ba ni mi gtsang ba med pas so //
T03D3811:92b-11: yi rangs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams ni rnam grangs so //
T03D3811:92b-12: dpal dang gzi brjid ni mthu'o //
T03D3811:92b-13: btsun pa ni mchod par bya ba nyid do //
T03D3811:92b-14: dad pa mang bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni

T03D3811:92b-16: phyir ro // bcom ldan 'das ma la yang dad par nye bar skyes pa'i dang bas so //
T03D3811:92b-17: ngal ba la ni gnod pa'o //
T03D3811:92b-18: 'gro ba la zhes bya ba ni phan tshun du gzhung dang /
T03D3811:92b-19: don nges par byed pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams so //
T03D3811:92b-20: dga' ba'i zhes bya ba ni rgyun gyis de nyid la'o //
T03D3811:92b-21: 'gro bar byed pa nyid gsungs pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:92b-22: mngon par byang chub pa'i sgra zhes bya ba la /
T03D3811:92b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di 'dir mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:92b-24: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T03D3811:92b-25: gsungs pa ni phyogs ga ge mo zhig nas ji
T03D3811:92b-26: srid du chos ston to zhes bya ba'i don to
T03D3811:92b-27: // yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi sgra zhes bya
T03D3811:92b-28: ba yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi sgra sgrogs pa
T03D3811:92b-29: // nyid gsungs pa / phyogs ga ge mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3811:92b-30: sad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sad par gyur pa sbyor bas so //
T03D3811:92b-31: mdangs rab tu bcug pas zhes bya ba ni lha'i mthus mdangs thob pa dang /
T03D3811:92b-33: bya ba thams cad nus pa'o //

T03D3811:92b-37: brkam pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o //
T03D3811:93a-0: @93a * // lhag mthong zung du 'brel ba rgyu ba'i lam mo //
T03D3811:93a-1: de spyod pa ni bsgom pa'i lam gyis kha sten par byed pa'am /
T03D3811:93a-2: de spyod pa ni gnas pa 'di la yod pas na rnal 'byor spyod pa'o //
T03D3811:93a-3: ci ltar rigs pa 'phags pa nyan thos la sogs
T03D3811:93a-4: pa'i yid la byed pa ni rnal 'byor nyid de
T03D3811:93a-5: de'i yongs su brlan pa ni 'dra ba'i brlan pa'o
T03D3811:93a-6: // ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i bde ba rjes
T03D3811:93a-7: su 'jug pa'i ngo bo gang la yod pa de
T03D3811:93a-8: // de lta bu'o // ci ltar ting nge 'dzin

T03D3811:93a-10: yang 'di zhes gsungs pa ni de ci'i phyir zhe

T03D3811:93a-14: nye bar sdud pa la sogs pa bsam pa nyid
T03D3811:93a-15: de tsam gyis ci ltar zhes gsungs pa ni de
T03D3811:93a-16: ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3811:93a-17: 'di dag kyang zhes bya ba la /
T03D3811:93a-18: sngar gsungs pa gcig pur ma zad kyi gang yang

T03D3811:93a-26: pa ni nyan pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3811:93a-27: // pa'o // gang zhig sngar bstan pa nyan pa dang /
T03D3811:93a-28: 'dzin pa la sogs pa yod pa la brten nas
T03D3811:93a-29: glegs bam gzhag pa nyid kyi de thams cad kyi
T03D3811:93a-30: phan yon 'di rnams zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
T03D3811:93a-31: de nyid kyi phyir sngar bshad pa dang /

T03D3811:93a-44: no // de bzhin du mchod pa rnam pa mang

T03D3811:93a-47: sogs pa'o // kyi bu'am / kyi bu 'am /
T03D3811:93b-0: no // / rigs kyi bu mo de @93b nyid
T03D3811:93b-1: de bas gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du

T03D3811:93b-4: no // / te / 'di po ti rnying pa
T03D3811:93b-5: rnams la med pas btags pa nyid 'di zhes bya

T03D3811:93b-9: pa la sogs pa byed pa po la bsod nams
T03D3811:93b-10: kyi khyad par ma bshad kyang grub pa'i phyir ro

T03D3811:93b-12: ji ltar chen mo rnams las 'don pa de ltar ni rigs pa yin no //
T03D3811:93b-13: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs
T03D3811:93b-14: rgyas thams cad kyi rkyen bzhi'i mchod pa las yongs
T03D3811:93b-15: su mya ngan las 'das pa'i rin po che sna
T03D3811:93b-16: bdun gyi mchod rten byas pa la mchod pa bas

T03D3811:93b-19: bsod nams mang ba nyid ces bya ba'o //

T03D3811:93b-21: sangs rgyas kyi tshul ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /

T03D3811:93b-24: ro // 'di la bral ba med pas bral ba

T03D3811:93b-26: ro // // gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T03D3811:93b-27: pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha

T03D3811:93b-32: du med pa'i yon tan 'dzin pa gang la de

T03D3811:93b-35: de dag gnyis kyis bkur stir byed pa ni me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa'o //
T03D3811:93b-36: de dag rjod par byed pa'i le'u ni pha rol
T03D3811:93b-37: tu phyin pa dang mchod rten la bkur sti byed
T03D3811:93b-38: pa gzhal du med pa'i yon tan 'dzin pa'i le'u
T03D3811:93b-39: zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o /
T03D3811:93b-41: // / de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su
T03D3811:93b-42: gang ba'i 'dzam bu'i gling las shes rab kyi pha
T03D3811:93b-43: rol tu phyin pa gzung ba nyid mchod pa la
T03D3811:94a-0: sogs pa'i don du 'os pa zhes @94a * //
T03D3811:94a-1: bstan pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das brgya byin la
T03D3811:94a-2: dri bar byed pa ni gal te khyod la zhes
T03D3811:94a-3: bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:94a-4: 'on te gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
T03D3811:94a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams
T03D3811:94a-6: cad la thob par byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T03D3811:94a-7: ring bsrel gyi snying po can rin po che sna
T03D3811:94a-8: bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi mchod rten byed pas
T03D3811:94a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchod pa
T03D3811:94a-11: la bsod nams mang ba nyid sngar bshad zin to
T03D3811:94a-12: // de nyid kyis 'di thams cad rtogs zhes slar
T03D3811:94a-13: rnam pa gzhan gyis nye bar bkod pa ni ci
T03D3811:94a-15: bden te 'on kyang sngar gang zhig rgyu gsungs pa
T03D3811:94a-16: de brgya byin gyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir yang
T03D3811:94a-17: rgyas par nye bar bkod pa'o //
T03D3811:94a-18: sku rnams zhes bya ba la /
T03D3811:94a-19: byed pa drug pa ste de rnams kyis yongs su gang ba'o //
T03D3811:94a-20: khyab pa tsam gyis ci zhig yin nam ma yin
T03D3811:94a-21: zhes gsungs pa ni byur bur yongs su bkang ste

T03D3811:94a-23: byed pas so // byin pa la zhes bya ba
T03D3811:94a-24: ni mchod pa'i don du nye bar sbyin par bya
T03D3811:94a-25: byed pas so // ba'o // brdabs na zhes bya ba ni cig shos long shig ces bya ba'o //
T03D3811:94a-26: ri mor bgyi ba ni gus pa'i khyad par ro //
T03D3811:94a-27: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das ma ni de rnams las shin tu bla mar gyur pa ste /
T03D3811:94a-28: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i don
T03D3811:94a-29: gyi sku'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig shes rab
T03D3811:94a-30: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3811:94a-31: yang dag pa'i don ni de kho na nyid kyi
T03D3811:94a-32: don te de dang ldan pa'i phyir bden pa'i don
T03D3811:94a-33: no // sku ni ring bsrel rnams ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:94a-34: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa la
T03D3811:94a-35: yul nyid kyis dam par zhes bya ba bstan par
T03D3811:94a-36: nus pa'i sku ni dam pa'i sku ste /
T03D3811:94a-37: gzugs kyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:94a-38: chos kyi skus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la /
T03D3811:94a-39: 'dir yongs su rdzogs pa ni rtogs pa ste de skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3811:94a-40: chos kyi sku kun tu rtog pa dang rnam par
T03D3811:94a-41: rtog pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad las 'das pa'i stong

T03D3811:94a-45: 'di yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T03D3811:94b-0: @94b yang dag pa'i mtha' ni stong pa nyid de des rab tu phye ba ni skyes pa ste /
T03D3811:94b-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos
T03D3811:94b-2: kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa bstan pa'i ngo bo
T03D3811:94b-4: don ni 'di yin te chos kyi sku ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste gtso bo'o //
T03D3811:94b-5: der ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi
T03D3811:94b-6: phyir yongs su bzung ba dang mchod pa la sogs
T03D3811:94b-7: pa nus pa ma yin no //
T03D3811:94b-8: bcom ldan 'das ma ni chos kyi sku'i rgyu mthun par gyur pa bcom ldan 'das dang /
T03D3811:94b-9: gzhan rnams kyi des rab tu phye ba de'i phyir
T03D3811:94b-10: gzugs kyi sku la chos kyi sku dang 'dra bas
T03D3811:94b-11: mchod par bya ba zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:94b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel rnams la gus pa nyid med dam ci zhe na /

T03D3811:94b-18: gal te yang kho bo la de rnams la gus

T03D3811:94b-20: // yang gi sgra ni sngar yang khyad par gsungs pa nyid kyang phyir ro //
T03D3811:94b-21: 'khrungs te zhes bya ba ni khyad par nyid kyis de'i rgyu nyid go ba ste /
T03D3811:94b-22: 'khrungs pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //

T03D3811:94b-26: zheng du ni dpag tshad sum cu pa rin po

T03D3811:94b-28: lha'i grong khyer blta na sdug pa la dpag tshad
T03D3811:94b-29: nyi shu la lho phyogs dang nub phyogs kyi cha
T03D3811:94b-30: la'o // bdag la gus pas zhes bya ba ni
T03D3811:94b-31: gdan gyi rang gi ngo bo chen po nyid kyis
T03D3811:94b-33: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:94b-34: dbang la rab tu grags pa dngos po thams cad
T03D3811:94b-35: ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir dbang ste

T03D3811:94b-39: de'i rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang rkyen gyi ngo bo nyid do //

T03D3811:95a-0: @95a * // gsungs pa nyid gsal bar byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

T03D3811:95a-24: / ba'o // de ltar yang ring bsrel rnams las

T03D3811:101b-19: btang bar mi bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang mi 'dor ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:101b-20: bsrung bar bya ba ni phyi rol gyi nye bar
T03D3811:101b-21: 'tshe ba las me dang bya ba la sogs kyis
T03D3811:101b-22: byas pa dang nang gi skyon nye bar bkod pa
T03D3811:101b-23: la sogs pa mu stegs pa rnams kyis byas pa
T03D3811:101b-24: las so // de bzhin du sba par bya ba
T03D3811:101b-25: ni chom rkun la sogs pa las bsrung ba'i phyir
T03D3811:101b-26: dang stong pa nyid la mi mos pa rnams la
T03D3811:101b-27: nye bar mi ston pa'i phyir yang gang gi phyir
T03D3811:101b-28: shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'o zhes bya ba ni
T03D3811:101b-29: gang zhig nyan pa dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa
T03D3811:101b-31: gang yang bcom ldan 'das ma'i yon tan rnams de
T03D3811:101b-32: thams cad lhag par mos shing zhes bya ba ni
T03D3811:101b-33: de ltar kho na zhes nye bar 'dzin pa yin
T03D3811:101b-34: no // bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:101b-35: dang gi sgra ni gang zhig ces bya ba ni dgug pa'i don du'o //
T03D3811:101b-36: gzhan rnams kyis mchod pa byed du bcug pa ma yin zhes bya ba nyid kyi sgra'i don to //
T03D3811:101b-37: mchod de zhes bya ba ni mchod pa thams cad byas nas so //
T03D3811:101b-38: don du gnyer zhing zhes bya ba ni don du
T03D3811:101b-39: gnyer bas na don de mchod pa la 'dod pa'o
T03D3811:101b-40: // de dang sbyar bas na don du gnyer ba'o //
T03D3811:102a-1: nas zhes bya ba ni khyad par du de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:102a-2: slong ba la zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das
T03D3811:102a-3: ma la mchod pa'i don du slong bar 'dod pa
T03D3811:102a-4: la'o // sbyin pa dang zhes bya ba ni khas len par byed pa'o //
T03D3811:102a-5: stob cing zhes bya ba ni nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3811:102a-6: 'bul ba la zhes bya ba ni 'dzin du 'jug pa'o //
T03D3811:102a-7: yongs su gtong na zhes bya ba ni 'gyod pa med pas so //
T03D3811:102a-8: tha na zhes bya ba ni ji srid ces bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:102a-9: glegs bam du chud par bgyis nas zhes bya ba
T03D3811:102a-10: ni rang nyid kyis zhes sam gzhan gyis 'drir 'jug
T03D3811:102a-11: pas kyang rung ste de'i yon gyis 'drir 'jug pa'o
T03D3811:102a-13: de'i don du blo ni 'dod pa 'di la yod pa de de'i blo can no //
T03D3811:102a-14: rang nyid kyis mchod pa la yang sbyin pa'i 'bras
T03D3811:102a-15: bu che ba nyid gzhan don nyid kyi phyir zhes
T03D3811:102a-16: bya ba bstan pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das brgya
T03D3811:102a-17: byin nyid la 'dri bar mdzad pa ni koo shi
T03D3811:102a-18: ka de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3811:102a-19: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni yongs
T03D3811:102a-20: su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus nyid la rdo
T03D3811:102a-21: rje lta bu'i bdag gi dngos po ting nge 'dzin
T03D3811:102a-22: gyi rdo rje 'bigs par mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs
T03D3811:102a-23: pa'i sku rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan rnams rjes
T03D3811:102a-24: su bzung ba'i don du byin gyis brlabs par mdzad
T03D3811:102a-25: pa'o // yang dag par ston par byed ces bya
T03D3811:102a-26: ba ni yon tan dang rang gi ngo bos so
T03D3811:102a-27: pa'o // // sbyin par byed pa ni mchod pa'i don du'o //
T03D3811:102a-28: kun du 'ged par byed ces bya ba ni lhag pa'i ring bsrel rnams sbyin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:102a-29: rgya cher ni rgya che ba ste des spyod pas na rgya che ba'o //
T03D3811:102a-30: ci bdag nyid kyis kyang zhes bya ba ni bdag
T03D3811:102a-31: nyid kyis de dang der song nas gzhan rnams la
T03D3811:102a-32: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sbyin
T03D3811:102a-33: par byed ces bya bas ston pa'i bya ba bstan
T03D3811:102a-34: par byed pa ni koo shi ka gzhan yang zhes
T03D3811:102a-35: bya ba la sogs pas so //
T03D3811:102a-36: snod du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni dad pa'i
T03D3811:102a-37: dbang po la sogs pa dang sbyor ba ma yin
T03D3811:102a-38: pa'i phyir ro // de bas na zhes bya ba
T03D3811:102a-39: ni gang zhig blangs pa sbyin par byed pa ni
T03D3811:102a-40: pa'i phyir ro // / sbyin pa bas tshul khrims
T03D3811:102a-41: che ba yin zhes dogs pa bsal ba'i don du
T03D3811:102a-42: 'dzam bu'i gling pa thams cad la dge ba bcu
T03D3811:102a-43: la rab tu gnas pa las bcom ldan 'das ma'i
T03D3811:102b-0: glegs bam sbyin pa la bsod nams @102b mang ba
T03D3811:102b-1: nyid gsal bar byed pa ni koo shi ka gzhan
T03D3811:102b-2: yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T03D3811:102b-3: yang dag par bkod cing zhes bya ba ni bya ba la blo brtan par byas pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:102b-4: bzhag na zhes bya ba ni mi 'da' ba nyid kyis so //
T03D3811:102b-5: mngon par dad pas zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i yon tan rnams so //
T03D3811:102b-6: gzhan du na gzhan du na gzhan dag tu sbyin par mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:102b-7: mngon par dad pa la zhes bya ba ni gzhan
T03D3811:102b-8: du na de sbyin pa tsam du mi 'gyur ro
T03D3811:102b-9: // de bzhin du 'og ma rnams la yang rig par bya'o //
T03D3811:102b-10: snyom las ni le lo ste snyom las med pa ni brtson 'grus so //
T03D3811:102b-11: des bsgrub par bya ba ni ji ltar gsungs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T03D3811:102b-12: brtson pas zhes bya ba ni mngon par brtson pa
T03D3811:102b-13: yod bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'di bcom ldan
T03D3811:102b-15: gzhung dang don dag la bslab pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:102b-16: yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba ni yang
T03D3811:102b-17: dag par rmongs pa rnams la mi shes pa dang
T03D3811:102b-18: the tshom za ba dang log pa'i shes pa rnams
T03D3811:102b-20: yang dag par dgod pa zhes bya ba ni skye
T03D3811:102b-21: dgu rnams la le lo dang 'dun pa med pa
T03D3811:102b-22: la sogs pa bsal ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:102b-23: yang dag par gzengs bstod pa zhes bya ba ni
T03D3811:102b-24: dman pa la lhag par mos pas yang dag par
T03D3811:102b-25: zhum pa rnams kyis mi nus pa'i bdag nyid yang
T03D3811:102b-26: dag par byung ba la sogs pa bsal ba'i phyir
T03D3811:102b-27: ro // yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed
T03D3811:102b-28: pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rtogs pa'i
T03D3811:102b-29: gong nas gong du mngon par dang ba'i rgyu'i bstod
T03D3811:102b-30: pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byed pa'o //
T03D3811:102b-31: gal te phyin ci log pa'i 'jig rten la ji
T03D3811:102b-32: ltar 'di nus zhes gsungs pa ni tshig gis mtshon
T03D3811:102b-33: pa dang zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:102b-34: ngag rnams nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba nyid 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:102b-35: 'di bsgrub par bya ba nyid ji ltar yin zhe na /
T03D3811:102b-36: gsungs pa rnam par mtshon pa dang zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:102b-37: lta ba ngan pa la sogs pa'i gegs rnams bsal ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:102b-38: bsal bar byas kyang yang dag par 'byung zhe na /
T03D3811:102b-39: rjes su mtshon pa dang zhes bya ba ste dad
T03D3811:102b-40: pa 'di nyid la g-yo ba med par byas pas
T03D3811:102b-41: so // de la 'di'i don yang dag par ston
T03D3811:102b-42: cing zhes bya ba ni de ltar snod du byas
T03D3811:103a-1: de'i sems rnam par sbyong ba dang zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas so //
T03D3811:103a-2: rim pa 'di ltar gang yin zhe na /
T03D3811:103a-3: gsungs pa de la 'di skad du /
T03D3811:103a-4: rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:103a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i lam la bslab pa nye bar bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3811:103a-6: nyan thos la sogs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
T03D3811:103a-7: 'dod pa'i rnyog pa bsal ba'i phyir sems rnam par
T03D3811:103a-8: sbyong bar byed pa ni bdag yang dag pa'i byang
T03D3811:103a-9: chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram ci 'on
T03D3811:103a-10: te ma yin sems can rnams kyang mya ngan las
T03D3811:103a-11: 'das pa la rab tu gnas par byed dam /
T03D3811:103a-12: 'on te ma yin zhes bya ba'i the tshom za
T03D3811:103a-13: ba'i the tshom dang bral bar byed ces gsungs pa
T03D3811:103a-14: ni lam 'di la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o
T03D3811:103a-15: // bslabs shing go cha'i brtson 'grus so //
T03D3811:103a-16: spyad de zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus so //
T03D3811:103a-17: 'bad na zhes bya ba ni mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus so //
T03D3811:103a-18: sems can gyi khams ni sems can gyi phung po'o //
T03D3811:103a-19: phung po yang dag par zad par zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:103a-20: phung po rnams kyi yang dag par zad pa ste de la'o //
T03D3811:103a-21: ma rig pa la sogs pa rnams kyang phung po rnams brjod pa yin no //
T03D3811:103a-22: 'on kyang de rnams dgra bcom pa'i dang po nyid du spangs pa ste /
T03D3811:103a-23: 'di yang gang zhig 'di tha ma'i phung po dgra
T03D3811:103a-24: bcom pa'i rgyud la gnas pa la dgongs nas mi
T03D3811:103a-25: brten par dgra bcom pa tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa
T03D3811:103a-27: de'i phung po la yang dag par zad pa ni
T03D3811:103a-28: phung po yang dag par zad pa lhag ma med
T03D3811:103a-30: gang gi phyir zag pa med pa'i khams ni sems can gyi phung po ste /
T03D3811:103a-32: rang sangs rgyas rnams la rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang
T03D3811:103a-33: bas mngon par ma grub pa'i 'dus byas kyi 'bras
T03D3811:103a-35: gzhan dbang thams cad kyis nye bar gos pa spangs
T03D3811:103a-36: pa de bzhin nyid tsam gyi rang bzhin rnam par
T03D3811:103a-37: grol ba'i sku'i bdag nyid ni phung po lhag ma
T03D3811:103a-38: med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes brjod pa
T03D3811:103a-39: yin no // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
T03D3811:103a-40: 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i
T03D3811:103b-0: sems can gyi mdzad pa grub pa @103b 'khor ba
T03D3811:103b-1: dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la rab tu
T03D3811:103b-2: mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid sku gsum gyi rang bzhin
T03D3811:103b-3: nyid kyi mya ngan las 'das pa phung po lhag
T03D3811:103b-4: ma med pa zhes bya bar brjod de /
T03D3811:103b-6: las kyi sgrib pa la sogs pa dang /
T03D3811:103b-7: phung po zag pa dang bcas pa'i skye ba'i phung po rnams yang dag par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:103b-8: yang na 'jig rten gyi khams 'ga' zhig tu sprul
T03D3811:103b-9: pa'i sku mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar bstan
T03D3811:103b-10: pa'i phyir de ltar na brjod pa yin no //
T03D3811:103b-11: phung po yang dag par zad pa la 'ga' zhig
T03D3811:103b-12: med par 'dzin par 'gyur ba de'i don du gsungs
T03D3811:103b-13: pa ni yang dag pa'i mthas rab tu 'byed pa
T03D3811:103b-15: gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' ni dngos po ma yin te /

T03D3811:103b-17: phyir de lta na yang dngos po yang ma yin
T03D3811:103b-18: te / de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid rang gis brtags pa dang /
T03D3811:103b-22: ma bral ba'i chos nyid kyi ngo bo spyi'i bdag nyid can gyis yod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:103b-23: de'i tshe de nyid mngon du byas pas nyan thos
T03D3811:103b-24: la sogs pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i sku
T03D3811:103b-25: ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku'o
T03D3811:103b-26: // de bas na de dag gi de lta bur
T03D3811:103b-27: gyur ba'i sku gnyis rab tu 'byed pa nyid ni
T03D3811:103b-28: yang dag pa'i mtha' rab tu phyed pa'o //
T03D3811:103b-29: yongs su gtong ba'i blo dang ldan pa zhes bya
T03D3811:103b-30: ba ni rnam pa thams cad du gtong ba'i blos
T03D3811:103b-31: / de bas kyang zhes bya ba ni dge ba
T03D3811:103b-32: bcu rab tu gnas par byed pa la gnas so
T03D3811:103b-33: / // de bzhin du gling bzhi pa la sogs
T03D3811:103b-34: pa'i rim pas mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3811:103b-35: kyi sems can rnams la yang dge ba bcu la

T03D3811:103b-37: bcom ldan 'das ma gtong ba nyid kyi bla na

T03D3811:103b-39: zhog ces bya ba la sogs pas so //
T03D3811:103b-40: dge ba la rab tu gnas pa nyid las gtong ba'i bsod nams mang ba ma yin te /
T03D3811:103b-41: 'on kyang bsam gtan la rab tu gnas pas kyang
T03D3811:103b-42: zhes gsungs pa ni koo shi ka gzhan yang zhes
T03D3811:103b-44: de ltar tshad med pa la sogs pa rnams la
T03D3811:104a-0: yang rab tu gnas pas bcom ldan 'das @104a *
T03D3811:104a-1: // ma'i gtong ba nyid bsod nams che ba de'i phyir thams cad gtong bar bya'o //
T03D3811:104a-2: rim gyis ston pa ni snga ma bzhin du lhag par mos pa bstan pa'i don du ste /
T03D3811:104a-3: bsod nams mang ba nyid kyi rgyu rnams la tshul
T03D3811:104a-4: bzhin yid la byed pa yang dag pa'i byang chub
T03D3811:104a-5: sgrub par byed pa rnams la gtso bo nyid yongs
T03D3811:104a-7: da ni gzhan don gyi spyod pa nyid 'ba' zhig
T03D3811:104a-8: pa glegs bam sbyin pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3811:104a-9: can mchog tu legs pa yin zhes bsam par byed
T03D3811:104a-10: cing / khyad par du byas pa'i rang dang gzhan
T03D3811:104a-11: don 'grub pa la bsod nams lhag pa nyid gsungs
T03D3811:104a-12: pa ni koo shi ka gzhan yang zhes bya ba
T03D3811:104a-14: le'u'i thog mar rang nyid kyis 'dzin pa la sogs
T03D3811:104a-15: pa byed pa las rang gzhan gyi rjes su bzung
T03D3811:104a-16: bar byed pa po'i bsod nams lhag pa nyid gsungs
T03D3811:104a-17: so // de'i rjes la dge ba bcu la sogs
T03D3811:104a-18: pa rab tu gnas par byed pa po rnams las
T03D3811:104a-19: gzhan gyi don du glegs bam sbyin pa la sogs
T03D3811:104a-20: pa byed pa po nyid la bsod nams shin tu
T03D3811:104a-21: mang ba zhes bstan zin to //
T03D3811:104a-22: da ni sbyin pa la sogs pa byed pa po
T03D3811:104a-23: las kyang rang nyid kyis klog par byed pa dang
T03D3811:104a-24: / gzhan rnams la yang 'dri bar bya ste sbyin
T03D3811:104a-25: pa las shin tu mang ba'i bsod nams nye bar
T03D3811:104a-26: bstan pa yin zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro
T03D3811:104a-27: / // 'di las kyang don gyis klog pa la
T03D3811:104a-28: sogs pa bsod nams lhag pa zhes gsungs pa ni
T03D3811:104a-29: koo shi ka gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3811:104a-30: / // pas so // gal te yang sngar don
T03D3811:104a-31: 'di rnams rnam par 'grel pa zhes bya ba gsungs
T03D3811:104a-32: pa nyid de de lta na yang don de phyin
T03D3811:104a-33: ci log pa'i bshad pa dang bral ba'i bstan par
T03D3811:104a-34: byas pas don la mkhas pa'o //
T03D3811:104a-35: don dang bcas tshig 'bru dang bcas pa nye bar
T03D3811:104a-36: bstan pa yin zhes bya ba'i don ni tshig 'bru
T03D3811:104a-37: de rnams kyang nye bar ston par byed pa /
T03D3811:104a-38: gang zhig shin tu grags pa'i tshig gi don nyid
T03D3811:104a-39: kyi brjod par bya ba'i don rang nyid kyis mngon
T03D3811:104a-41: yi ge'i don yongs su bsngo ba'i bshad pas ni ma yin te /
T03D3811:104a-42: ji ltar bdud kyis smras pa'i tshigs su bcad pa las /
T03D3811:104a-43: tshe ring ba ni mi rnams kyi //
T03D3811:104b-0: skyes pas @104b mtho 'tshams pa ni min //
T03D3811:104b-1: myos dang bag med spyod min te //
T03D3811:104b-4: yig 'bru rnams ni yongs su bsgyur bas gzhan du bshad par nus pa yin te /
T03D3811:104b-5: tshe ring ba la mtho 'tshams pa ma yin te
T03D3811:104b-6: myos pas spyod pa ma yin bag med pas kyang
T03D3811:104b-7: ma yin no // 'dir ni 'chi bdag 'ongs pa med //
T03D3811:104b-9: 'on kyang 'chad pa po'i brjod par 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
T03D3811:104b-11: ji ltar las yod las kyi rnam par smin pa
T03D3811:104b-12: yod kyang byed pa po ni dmigs pa ma yin
T03D3811:104b-14: rang dga' sna tshogs par byed pa po'i bdag bkag pa 'di ma yin te /
T03D3811:104b-15: gang zag gi ngo bo bshad pa ni ma yin no //
T03D3811:104b-16: de bas na don de rnams dang tshig 'bru de rnams dang nye bar ston par byed /
T03D3811:104b-17: gang rnams kyis brjod par bya ba dang rjod par
T03D3811:104b-18: byed pa'i ngo bo shin tu grags pa nyid bcom
T03D3811:104b-19: ldan 'das kyi bzhed pa zhes rtogs pa yin no
T03D3811:104b-20: // gang du yang gdul bya'i bsam pa'i ngor bstan
T03D3811:104b-21: pa'i bshad pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yongs su
T03D3811:104b-22: bsgyur cing bstan pa de la ni skyon med de
T03D3811:104b-23: // ji ltar / pha dang ma ni bsad byas nas //
T03D3811:104b-24: bram ze dag par 'gyur ba yin //
T03D3811:104b-26: de la ma ni srid pa'o //
T03D3811:104b-27: pha ni las kyi srid pa ste skyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3811:104b-28: ji ltar yang theg pa chen po la bcom ldan
T03D3811:104b-29: 'das kyis drang ba'i don rnams la 'di lta bu'i
T03D3811:104b-30: bshad pa ste / rigs kyi bu sgra ji bzhin
T03D3811:104b-31: du byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du chos rnams
T03D3811:104b-32: rab tu bsam par byed pa na theg pa chen
T03D3811:104b-33: po ni dad pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur te /
T03D3811:104b-34: sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa dgongs pa can gyi
T03D3811:104b-35: don tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni dad
T03D3811:104b-36: pa'i gnas theg pa chen por 'gyur zhes bya ba
T03D3811:104b-37: la sogs pa'o // dad pa skyed par byed pa'i
T03D3811:104b-38: mdo dang kun nas snang bar byed pa la yang
T03D3811:104b-39: gsungs pa sgra ji bzhin don du yongs su rtogs
T03D3811:104b-40: la sogs pa'o // pa na / rang gi rtogs pa blo las 'grib par 'gyur ba yin /
T03D3811:104b-41: legs par spyad pa nyid ni spong zhing 'grib pa dang //
T03D3811:104b-42: chos la khong khro dang ni 'grib pa yang thob 'gyur //
T03D3811:105a-0: de'i phyir drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde'i tshig rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das @105a * //
T03D3811:105a-1: nyid kyis bshad pa mdzad pa gang zhig dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa la sogs pa rnams dang /

T03D3811:105a-3: dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa'i bstan
T03D3811:105a-4: bcos rnams la gang zhig de'i tshe /

T03D3811:105a-6: bstan pa ring du gnas bya'i phyir //
T03D3811:105a-7: mdo yi de nyid don ni bsdus //
T03D3811:105a-8: mdo yi drang don nges don gyi //
T03D3811:105a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa lung bstan pa thob
T03D3811:105a-11: pa 'phags pa thogs med kyi zhal snga nas la
T03D3811:105a-12: sogs pa rnams kyis bshad pa mdzad pa de ni

T03D3811:105a-15: de bas na don dang bcas tshig 'bru dang bcas
T03D3811:105a-16: pa legs par nye bar ston pa dang yongs su
T03D3811:105a-17: gsal bar byed pa ni 'thad pa dang 'thad pa
T03D3811:105a-18: rnams kyis so // 'di ni 'dir bya ba'i khyad par ro //
T03D3811:105a-19: 'di ni zhes bya ba la bya ba'i khyad par de la yod par 'gyur pa'o //
T03D3811:105a-20: de bas zhes bya ba ni snga ma las so //
T03D3811:105a-21: brgya byin ni don dang tshig 'bru dag las rnam

T03D3811:105a-23: byed pa ni 'di yang nye bar bstan par bgyi
T03D3811:105a-24: ba lags sam zhes bya ba ste /

T03D3811:105a-26: brnyan 'byung ba ma 'ongs pa gzigs shing gsungs pa
T03D3811:105a-27: ni nye bar bstan par bya ba zhes bya ba'o

T03D3811:105a-31: bo'i don spangs pa gang yang don gzhan sgrogs pa
T03D3811:105a-32: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni
T03D3811:105a-33: gzugs brnyan du 'dod pa yin no //
T03D3811:105a-34: de nyid kyis dad pa can blun po slu ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:105a-35: skye ba la ni nhri tsa'o //
T03D3811:105a-37: skye ba rnams nhri tsa zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
T03D3811:105a-38: de la zhes bya ba ni de ltar yod pa na'o //
T03D3811:105a-39: chud zos par gyur na mi rung ngo zhes bya
T03D3811:105a-40: ba ni yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi lam las
T03D3811:105a-41: ltung bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i don to
T03D3811:105a-42: // chud zos gyur na mi rung ba ji ltar yin zhe na /

T03D3811:105b-0: na'i rkyen @105b thob pa yin no //
T03D3811:105b-1: gzhan gyi don gyi tshig sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:105b-2: ming gi sngon du 'gro ba'i sgrub pa mi rtag
T03D3811:105b-3: pa nyid kyi phyir de 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro
T03D3811:105b-4: // de lta na yang ru da la sogs pa
T03D3811:105b-5: nyid kyi phyir ae ta med pa'i phyogs la 'phel
T03D3811:105b-7: snga ma bzhin du mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir de mi 'byung ngo //
T03D3811:105b-8: gzugs brnyan shes pa'i don du brgya byin gyi 'dri
T03D3811:105b-9: ba ni ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na zhes
T03D3811:105b-11: gzugs brnyan ston par byed pa ni stong pa nyid

T03D3811:105b-13: kyi rgyu la yang don dam par skur pa 'debs
T03D3811:105b-14: so // med par gyur pa'i ngo bo 'di rnams la sgro 'dogs par byed /
T03D3811:105b-15: yod par gyur pa yang nyams par byed ces bya ba'o //
T03D3811:105b-16: cho ga phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T03D3811:105b-17: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T03D3811:105b-18: ting 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T03D3811:105b-19: lta ba phun sum tshogs kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:105b-20: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T03D3811:105b-21: 'dir cig shos kyi gang zag gi lta ba ni
T03D3811:105b-22: sla'i stong pa nyid la skyon du bzung ba ni
T03D3811:105b-24: stong pa nyid la skyon du bzung bas shes bya'i
T03D3811:105b-25: dngos po la rmongs shing shes bya thams cad la
T03D3811:105b-26: skur pa 'debs pas ngan song rnams su skye bar
T03D3811:105b-27: 'gyur ro // chos don du gnyer ba dang du:
T03D3811:105b-28: kha la rnam par grol ba'i don du gnyer ba
T03D3811:105b-29: gzhan la slu bar byed pa yin no //
T03D3811:105b-30: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la lhod par 'gyur zhing gang
T03D3811:105b-31: zag tu lta ba can ni de lta ma yin
T03D3811:105b-33: lus ma bsgoms pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:105b-34: zhi ba'i spyod lam la sogs pa la rjes su mthun par mi gnas pa'i phyir ma bsgoms pa'o //
T03D3811:105b-35: tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa zhes bya ba ni bslab pa rnams la lhod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3811:105b-36: sems ma bsgoms pa zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims
T03D3811:105b-37: dang yang dag par ldan pas yangs pa med pa'i
T03D3811:105b-38: phyir dang myur du ting nge 'dzin la mngon par
T03D3811:105b-39: phyogs par 'dod nus pa ste de med pas so
T03D3811:105b-40: // gang zhig yang dus gcig tu de rnams la srid pa'i sdug bsngal dang //
T03D3811:105b-41: yid 'byung ba la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin 'byung
T03D3811:106a-0: ba de lta na yang ji lta ba bzhin @106a
T03D3811:106a-1: * // ma yin pa'i don la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir skyon gyi gnyen po ma yin te /
T03D3811:106a-2: de bas na log pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes sems ma bsgoms pa nyid brjod pa yin no //
T03D3811:106a-3: shes rab ma bsgoms pa zhes bya ba ni ji
T03D3811:106a-4: lta ba bzhin du chos kyi bdag med pa yongs
T03D3811:106a-5: su mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:106a-6: shes rab 'chal ba ni phyin ci log gi don la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:106a-7: de nyid kyi phyir lug ltar lkugs pa'i rang bzhin
T03D3811:106a-8: can ni gzhan gyis legs par smras pa mi nyan
T03D3811:106a-9: pa'i phyir dang rang nyid kyis kyang legs par smra
T03D3811:106a-10: ba mi brjod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:106a-11: shes rab yongs su nyams pa ni ma thob pa
T03D3811:106a-12: yongs su nyams pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes
T03D3811:106a-13: rab las yongs su nyams pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:106a-14: de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la gzugs rnam par 'dzin pa dang /
T03D3811:106a-15: gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ces ston par 'gyur zhes
T03D3811:106a-16: bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3811:106a-17: pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba gtso bo'o //
T03D3811:106a-18: 'di rnams kyang theg pa chen po nyid phyin ci log tu 'chad pa po rnams so //
T03D3811:106a-19: de bas na gzugs su snang ba'i rnam par rig pa ste phyi rol gyi don ma yin no //
T03D3811:106a-20: de lta na yang kha cig 'don pa yin te /
T03D3811:106a-21: phyi rol bzhin du snang rnams la //
T03D3811:106a-22: kun brtags pa ni gzugs brjod do //
T03D3811:106a-24: gal te rnam par 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid mi rtag
T03D3811:106a-25: par gyur na de'i tshe 'jig pa nyid rnam par
T03D3811:106a-26: 'jig pa yang ma skyes pa rnams la de bas
T03D3811:106a-27: na rnam par 'jig pa mthong ba chos gsum dmigs
T03D3811:106a-28: par 'gyur ro // de rnams kyang skye ba dang rnam par 'jig pa dag go //
T03D3811:106a-29: de'i phyir don dam pa po chos thams cad mi
T03D3811:106a-30: dmigs pa'i rang bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3811:106a-31: phyin pa mthong ba ma yin no //
T03D3811:106a-32: rnam par 'dzin pa la mi rtag pa nyid dgag
T03D3811:106a-33: par byed pa ni koo shi ka yang zhes bya
T03D3811:106a-35: mi rtag pa ni du tsam yin gang zhig theg

T03D3811:106a-38: gzugs brnyan ni ji ltar ston par mi 'gyur te
T03D3811:106a-39: gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
T03D3811:106a-40: gang zhig gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
T03D3811:106b-0: gang zhig yang dngos po @106b med pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T03D3811:106b-1: de la gzugs nyid kyang med na rtag pa lta ga la yod /
T03D3811:106b-2: de bzhin du tshor ba dang /

T03D3811:106b-6: gang zhig yang rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin de
T03D3811:106b-7: ni dngos po med pa ste zhes bya ba la
T03D3811:106b-8: sogs pa gang zhig 'di ltar nye bar ston par
T03D3811:106b-9: byed pa de ni gzugs brnyan nye bar ston par
T03D3811:106b-10: mi byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:106b-11: gal te 'dir rnam par 'jig pa ni mi rtag
T03D3811:106b-12: pa'i don mi 'gyur na de'i phyir rtag pa nyid
T03D3811:106b-13: dngos po med pa mi rtag pa zhes shugs kyis

T03D3811:106b-16: dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa'i bstan
T03D3811:106b-17: bcos rnams dang / 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyang rang gi bstan bcos rnams dang /
T03D3811:106b-18: de'i bzhed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sngon gyi slob
T03D3811:106b-19: dpon rnams kyis kyang stong pa nyid kyi don gang
T03D3811:106b-20: nyid bstan pa de nyid ni phyin ci ma log

T03D3811:106b-22: de la gzhan dag theg pa chen po pa rnams
T03D3811:106b-23: kyis nye bar bstan pa ni gzugs brnyan gyi ngo

T03D3811:106b-27: pa shes par smra ba rnams kyis re zhig rang
T03D3811:106b-28: gis brtags pa nyid kyi grub mtha' gzhan rnams slu
T03D3811:106b-29: ba'i don du mgon po byams pa'i bzhed pa log
T03D3811:106b-30: pa nyid du bsgrags nas brjod cing snang ngo //

T03D3811:106b-32: ngo bo la gang zhig brtags pa 'dzin pa dang

T03D3811:106b-34: zhig gnyis kyis dben pa'i ngo bo yongs su grub

T03D3811:106b-38: 'jig pa dang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa

T03D3811:106b-40: gzugs zhes bya ba ni gzugs su snang ba'i rnam par rig pa'o //

T03D3811:107a-1: ltar na yang ji ltar 'du byed kyi phung po

T03D3811:107a-3: 'du shes kyi phung po dag la so sor rnam
T03D3811:107a-4: par gzhag pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa
T03D3811:107a-6: phyi rol bzhin du snang ba rnams la //
T03D3811:107a-7: gzugs kyi phung po nyid du brtags zhes smras so //
T03D3811:107a-8: gzugs 'jig pa la rab tu 'jig pa'o //
T03D3811:107a-9: gang la yod pa de ni gzugs kyi mi rtag pa nyid do //
T03D3811:107a-10: gzugs la rtag tu med pa ni ma yin no //

T03D3811:107a-16: pa de ltar don dam par yod pa ma yin
T03D3811:107a-17: no // 'on kyang gzhan gyi dbang zhes bya ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do //
T03D3811:107a-18: de bas na gzhan dbang med pas thams cad med pa zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:107a-19: mdor bsdus pa don dam par yod pa nyid gzhan
T03D3811:107a-20: dbang rnam par 'jig pas rnam par dag pa'i gzhan
T03D3811:107a-21: dbang gnyis kyis stong pa'i skyes pa'i rang gi ngo
T03D3811:107a-22: bo nyid ni stong pa nyid de de nyid ni
T03D3811:107a-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid de
T03D3811:107a-24: gzugs brnyan ni ma yin no //
T03D3811:107a-25: 'on te de rnams kyi rgyu 'bras kyi ngo bo
T03D3811:107a-26: don dam par med ces bya ba gsal ba tsam
T03D3811:107a-27: gyi lus rnam par shes pa la gzhan dbang nyid
T03D3811:107a-28: cis bya ba 'ga' yang med de /
T03D3811:107a-29: 'di ltar ni brjod pa yin te snga ma dang
T03D3811:107a-30: phyi ma rtogs par nges pa nyid ni rgyu 'bras
T03D3811:107a-31: kyi ngo bo rtogs pa de smra ba po rnams
T03D3811:107a-32: kyis mngon par brjod par bya ste /
T03D3811:107a-33: snga ma la yang ma yin phyi ma la yang ma yin /
T03D3811:107a-34: de gnyi ga'i bag chags las skyes pa rjes su
T03D3811:107a-35: 'dzin pa'i ngo bo 'di las 'di zhes tha dad
T03D3811:107a-36: par 'dzin pa'i rgyu 'bras kyi ngo bo nyams su

T03D3811:107a-39: nyid kyis gzhan gyi gtam la 'dris pa mi 'thad

T03D3811:107a-42: yang 'di tsam dang ldan pas 'di tsam dang ldan
T03D3811:107a-43: pa nyid 'di tsam ni ma yin no //
T03D3811:107b-0: gcig tu 'dzin pa'i blos @107b ni gcig kyang ma
T03D3811:107b-1: yin pa de'i phyir rtogs pa po gzhan gang yin
T03D3811:107b-3: rtogs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:107b-4: de'i stobs kyis gang gi yul gcig ma yin te
T03D3811:107b-5: de bas na de dag la yang rang gi ngo
T03D3811:107b-6: bo tsam yul yin la 'dis ni snga phyi'i ngo
T03D3811:107b-7: bo'i rtogs pa ni sun 'byin par 'dzin no //
T03D3811:107b-8: snga phyi nyid 'ga' zhig gis mi 'dzin pa'i phyir
T03D3811:107b-9: gang gis de'i bdag nyid can rgyu 'bras kyi ngo
T03D3811:107b-11: gang gi phyir 'di mngon sum tsam gyis bya ba ma yin no //

T03D3811:107b-13: pa'i dus la ni 'di ni thams cad tha snyad
T03D3811:107b-15: rang gi ngo bo rig pa rtse gcig pa nyid la ni /
T03D3811:107b-16: gang du tha dad pa'i snga phyi'i ngo bo'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3811:107b-17: blo ni snga min phyi ma min //
T03D3811:107b-18: de 'dzin pa po bdag gzhan min //
T03D3811:107b-19: phyi nas rnam rtog 'dzin pa zhes //
T03D3811:107b-20: zug rdu skya bseng rgyal bar 'gyur //
T03D3811:107b-21: de ltar 'os pa gnas pa khong stong dag pas yang //
T03D3811:107b-22: gang phyir nam yang rtogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin te //
T03D3811:107b-23: dus gzhan la ni gang gis dus su gang gis mthong ba ste //
T03D3811:107b-24: rgyu la the tshom gal te mi gnod pa ni de //
T03D3811:107b-25: dmigs pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba gang la ni //

T03D3811:107b-27: ji ltar dmigs bya ba mi dmigs pa yi dus la ni //
T03D3811:107b-28: dmigs pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i rgyu la'o //
T03D3811:107b-29: de'i phyir rgyu 'bras kyi ngo bo 'di ni snga
T03D3811:107b-30: phyir gyur pa 'ga' zhig la mi dmigs pa'i phyir
T03D3811:107b-31: dmigs pa'i srid pa dang bral ba phyi rol gyi
T03D3811:107b-32: don bzhin du med pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
T03D3811:107b-33: de'i phyir gzugs kyi rnam par 'jig pa mi rtag
T03D3811:107b-34: pa zhes de rnams la thal ba yod pa ma
T03D3811:107b-36: bden te da ltar byung ba kha cig la rtog
T03D3811:107b-37: ge skam po rtsa ba med pa nyid yod pa

T03D3811:107b-40: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dngos po'i de kho

T03D3811:107b-42: kyis skye ba la sogs pa rnams brjod par bya

T03D3811:108a-8: sems kyi rgyu ma 'ongs pa ci nas kyang khas

T03D3811:108a-13: bya ba ni gzugs brnyan nyid do //

T03D3811:108a-16: kyi phyir blo rnams kyi tha dad par snga phyi'i
T03D3811:108a-17: ngo bo sbyor ba ma yin zhes bya ba de

T03D3811:108a-22: de'i phyir de kho na nyid sgom pa'i goms pas

T03D3811:122b-4: bag 'khums pa ni ngal ba'i rgyun no //

T03D3811:160b-45: bdag dang bdag gi ba nyid kyi gnas skabs de

T03D3811:161a-1: bdag tu mngon par zhen pa las byung ba'i kun

T03D3811:161a-3: pa'o // rnam par mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu
T03D3811:161a-4: phyin pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rnam
T03D3811:161a-5: par mi rtog pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid de

T03D3811:161a-7: ba ni rnam par rtog pa mi dmigs pa'o //
T03D3811:161a-8: chos kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi slad du mi dmigs

T03D3811:161a-18: rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du rten ma mchis pa'i

T03D3811:161a-25: de bas na bcom ldan 'das ma skyes pa ma mchis pa ste /

T03D3811:161a-28: chos thams cad 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du 'di
T03D3811:161a-29: ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
T03D3811:161a-30: bya ba ni gang gi phyir chos thams cad skyed

T03D3811:161a-43: 'di ni stong pa'i slad du 'di ni stong pa'i
T03D3811:161a-44: pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni gang

T03D3811:161b-15: ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir chos rnams de

T03D3811:161b-23: yod pa ma yin na zhes bya ba med pa

T03D3811:161b-26: bya ba ni mtshan nyid mtshan ma ste gang gi

T03D3811:162a-27: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang sangs

T03D3811:162a-34: zhes bya ba bshad par bya'o //

T03D3811:163a-17: bsam gtan shes rab thabs nyid dang //

T03D3811:163a-30: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces

T03D3811:163a-42: rnam par grol ba rnams la nyams pa med pa
T03D3811:163a-43: zhes bya ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug go
T03D3811:163a-44: // lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad

T03D3811:163b-9: sbyar ba'i don du byas pa ste de yang sngon
T03D3811:163b-10: gyi po ti rnams la mi srid pa drang srong

T03D3811:163b-14: dbye ba rnam pa bcu drug ni //

T03D3811:163b-37: nyid de rnams kyi thos pa la sogs pa zhes

T03D3811:163b-41: pa zhes bya ba ni 'ga' zhig tu 'don pa'o
