T03D3811:173a-40: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni 'dir ma smos zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:173a-41: bskal pa de snyed du zhes bya ba ni sems
T03D3811:173b-0: bskyed pa la nye @173b bar gyur pa de tsam
T03D3811:173b-2: slar rnal 'byor nyid du bya bar 'gyur ba la
T03D3811:173b-3: zhes bya ba ni slar de tsam gyi bskal pa
T03D3811:173b-4: rnams kyis yongs su smin pa thob par 'gyur te
T03D3811:173b-5: shes rab nyam chung bas zhes bya ba'i don to
T03D3811:173b-6: // 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T03D3811:173b-7: zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
T03D3811:173b-8: rjes su mthun pa rnams la'o //
T03D3811:173b-9: nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skye bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3811:173b-10: brjod 'dod pa'i sems kyis bor nas lus ngag dag gis nges 'byung gi mthar thug par 'gro ba'o //
T03D3811:173b-11: de ltar blo chung ba de dag zhes bya bas nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T03D3811:173b-12: yal ga zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:173b-13: phyogs gcig pa'i ye shes don du gnyer pa rnams
T03D3811:173b-14: kyi dbang du byas nas mdo la sogs pa rigs
T03D3811:173b-15: pa yin te / 'di nyid la dpe gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:173b-16: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:173b-18: zan kham ni kham zan no //
T03D3811:173b-19: btsal bar sems pa zhes bya ba ni dman pa slong ba'i dbang gis so //
T03D3811:173b-20: de yang khyi ni rnyed par sla ba dang mngar ba bdag po'i zan chang rnam par spangs nas /
T03D3811:173b-21: las byed pa'i zan kham 'dod par gyur ba rnyed pa ma yin no //
T03D3811:173b-22: chung ba'am mngar ba ma yin pa rnyed pa yin te /
T03D3811:173b-23: de bzhin du 'dir yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3811:173b-24: rtsa ba 'di bor te zhes bya ba ni ji
T03D3811:173b-25: ltar shing gi rtsa ba la sbyar ba'i shing thams
T03D3811:173b-26: cad kyi 'bras bu la dbang ba nyid do //
T03D3811:173b-27: gang zhig rtsa ba bor nas yal ga 'dzin par
T03D3811:173b-28: byed pa de rnams kyi phyogs ni phyogs gcig pa'i
T03D3811:173b-29: 'bras bu'i skal ba can zhes de rnams kyis gtso
T03D3811:173b-31: de bzhin du 'dir yang 'bras bu thams cad thob pa'i rtsa ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma ste /
T03D3811:173b-32: de dor nas yal ga dang 'dra ba'i nyan thos
T03D3811:173b-33: kyi theg pa la dmigs pas sangs rgyas nyid la
T03D3811:173b-34: thob pa med ces bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:173b-35: lo ma dang 'dab ma lta bu ni lo ma'i tshogs te /
T03D3811:173b-36: 'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde rnams la mngon par brtson pa rnams so //
T03D3811:173b-37: dul bar bya ba ni dbang po lnga 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:173b-38: zhi bar bya ba ni sems 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:173b-39: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba ni srid pa gzhan zad pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:174a-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par 'du byed pa ni @174a * //
T03D3811:174a-2: de'i don du sbyor ba ni bya ba rnams so //
T03D3811:174a-3: de rlom sems su yang mi bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3811:174a-4: de rnams dang bdag nyid ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:174a-5: kha dog dang dbyibs tshol te zhes bya ba ni dbyibs dang rnam pa'o //
T03D3811:174a-6: snang ba ga la ba der zhes bya ba ni snang ba dang bcas pa'o //
T03D3811:174a-7: brtags so zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'o //
T03D3811:174a-8: glang po che'i rjes zhes bya ba ni glang po che'i rjes kyi mtshan ma'o //
T03D3811:174a-9: bdag gcig pu dul ba dang zhi bar gnas pa
T03D3811:174a-10: dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba
T03D3811:174a-11: nyid do zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:174a-13: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:174a-14: nang du yang dag gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin no //
T03D3811:174a-15: tshe 'di nyid las zhes bya ba ni skye ba thob pa nyid la'o //
T03D3811:174a-16: len pa med pa zhes bya ba ni cung zad kyang yongs su mi 'dzin pas so //
T03D3811:174a-17: spro ba chung ba la sems mi bskyed do zhes bya ba ni don chung ngu la sbyor ba'o //
T03D3811:174a-18: dus rtag tu zhes bya ba ni ji srid byang chub kyi bar du'o //
T03D3811:174a-19: rgyun ni rgyun yang yin la skye ba re rer 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:174a-20: mi 'chad pa yang yin te zhag rer 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:174a-21: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3811:174a-22: pa nyid ni mtha' yas pa'i yon tan gyi rnam
T03D3811:174a-23: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyu yin gyi
T03D3811:174a-24: nyan thos la sogs pa'i mdo sde ni ma yin
T03D3811:174a-25: zhes ston to // de nyid gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:174a-26: shing mkhan ni shing gi bzo bo'o //
T03D3811:174a-27: ri rab kyi rgyab tu brgya byin gyi blta na
T03D3811:174a-28: sdug pa zhes bya ba'i gser las byas pa'i grong
T03D3811:174a-29: khyer ro // de'i dbus su rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i khang bzangs te /
T03D3811:174a-30: logs re rer dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu'o //
T03D3811:174a-31: gcig tu bsdus na dpag tshad stong ngo //
T03D3811:174a-32: ri rab kyi phyed nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i
T03D3811:174a-33: ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang zlum po rim pa
T03D3811:174a-34: ji lta bar dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig dang
T03D3811:174a-35: lnga bcu dbus kyi thig gis de'i dbus su de
T03D3811:174a-36: dag gi khang bzangs ni sa chen po ste /
T03D3811:174a-37: de bas na 'dir de dag gi khang bzangs brjod par bya'o //
T03D3811:174a-38: de yang rnam par rgyal ba las shin tu yang nyung ba'i tshad do //
T03D3811:174b-0: mngon par ston pa ni thob par @174b byed pa'o //
T03D3811:174b-1: 'jig rten du 'khor los sgyur bas na 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
T03D3811:174b-2: 'khor lo de yang skyes bus ma byas pa rtsibs stong lte ba dang bcas pa'o //
T03D3811:174b-3: 'khor los sgyur ba skye ba med pa la chos bzangs lha'i 'dun sa na 'chang ba yod do //
T03D3811:174b-4: gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba 'dzam bu'i gling
T03D3811:174b-5: du skyes na de'i tshe des legs par khrus byas
T03D3811:174b-6: pa dang bsnyen gnas bzung ba'i mdun du chos bzangs
T03D3811:174b-7: nas 'ongs te / nam mkha' la gnas par 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:174b-8: 'khor los sgyur ba ni lnga ste /
T03D3811:174b-9: gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang gling bzhi la dbang
T03D3811:174b-10: ba rnams dang mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du 'gro
T03D3811:174b-11: ba'o // 'di rnams kyi 'khor lo yang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du lcags dang /
T03D3811:174b-15: gser mdog la sogs pa skyes pa 'dzam bu'i chu bo dang 'dra ba'o //
T03D3811:174b-16: dbyibs ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
T03D3811:174b-17: gnyis dang ldan pa gzi brjid ni mi thams cad
T03D3811:174b-18: zil gyis gnon pa mthu dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
T03D3811:174b-19: ni rdzu 'phrul dang phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T03D3811:174b-20: khyad par du mi rin po che bdun te /
T03D3811:174b-27: nor bu rin po che rnams so //
T03D3811:174b-28: 'ching bar byed pa ni rmongs par byed pa'o //
T03D3811:174b-29: yongs su mi gsal ba'i phyir dang gzhan nyid kyi phyir 'ching bar byed pa'o //
T03D3811:174b-30: rgyu gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' yang dag
T03D3811:174b-31: par 'grub pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yang
T03D3811:174b-33: thob cing zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa tsam gyis so //
T03D3811:174b-34: bsgrubs nas ni thob pa la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T03D3811:174b-35: bor te zhes bya ba ni dor nas so //
T03D3811:174b-36: rnam par 'gyur nas zhes bya ba ni rgyab phyogs su byas nas so //
T03D3811:174b-38: rdzas kyi dbye ba dang phan tshun du 'dres par brgyar 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:174b-39: de bas na kha zas ro brgya pa'o //
T03D3811:174b-40: zhag drug cu pa'i zhes bya ba ni nub drug cus smin par 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3811:174b-41: de rnams kyi 'bras chan ni drug cu pa'i 'bras chan te /
T03D3811:174b-42: sha kan rgyu la sogs pa mthong ba'i phyir 'og tu 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3811:174b-43: zhu na phan pa zhu na bde pa zhes bya
T03D3811:174b-44: ba ni ji srid du de'i mthar thug par zhes
T03D3811:175a-1: zhes bya ba ni sems kyis so //
T03D3811:175a-2: rnam par spangs nas zhes bya ba ni lus kyis so //
T03D3811:175a-3: zab mo ni don dam pa'i rtse mo'o //
T03D3811:175a-4: 'od gsal ba ni mchog tu dri ma dang bral
T03D3811:175a-5: ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis snang ba'i rang bzhin yin
T03D3811:175a-6: pa'i phyir ro // mang bar 'gyur te zhes bya
T03D3811:175a-7: ba ni rnam pa mang ba'i rnam par rtog pa
T03D3811:175a-8: pa'i phyir ro // rnams so // shes rab kyi
T03D3811:175a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par mi rtog
T03D3811:175a-10: pa'i phyir sems rnam par g-yeng bar byed pa la
T03D3811:175a-11: da ltar yang dag par shes so //
T03D3811:175a-12: bcom ldan 'das ma bris pa la bar chad mang
T03D3811:175a-13: bas de bri ba la mngon par zhen ba bdud
T03D3811:175a-14: kyi las zhes gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:175a-15: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:175a-16: gang gi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3811:175a-17: pa ni lam gyi 'bras su'i rang bzhin te gzugs
T03D3811:175a-18: kyi khyad par gyi tha snyad kyi mtshan nyid can
T03D3811:175a-20: yi ge 'brur 'dri bar nus pa ma yin no //
T03D3811:175a-21: rab 'byor gang su dag shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3811:175a-22: tu phyin pa yi ge 'brur bris nas zhes bya
T03D3811:175a-23: ba ste / yi ge med pa'o snyam nas yi
T03D3811:175a-24: ge med pa'o zhes bya ba rlom sems su 'gyur
T03D3811:175a-25: pa de thams cad bdud kyi las te /
T03D3811:175a-26: gang gi phyir de 'dri ba med pa ste /
T03D3811:175a-27: gzugs dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:175a-28: med pa yang ma yin te /
T03D3811:175a-29: don dam par yod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:175a-30: yi ge yang ma yin te brjod du med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:175a-31: yi ge med pa yang ma yin te kun rdzob
T03D3811:175a-32: tu yi ge rnams nyid de'i don gyis dmigs nas
T03D3811:175a-34: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yul
T03D3811:175a-35: ni ma la ba la sogs pa ste brgya'am stong
T03D3811:175a-36: ngam 'bum gyis grangs byas pa'i khyim mo //
T03D3811:175a-37: grong ni phyug po ma yin pa rnams kyi gnas so //
T03D3811:175a-38: stong ngam 'bum gyis grangs byas pa'i khyim ni gnas so //
T03D3811:175a-39: skyed mos tshal ni phal cher grong khyer ro //
T03D3811:175a-40: grong rdal ni grong khyer nyid tshong pas mang bar byas pa'o //
T03D3811:175a-41: ljongs ni rdo 'jog la sogs pa'o //
T03D3811:175a-43: rgyal po'i pho brang ni rgyal pos bsten par byas pa'o //
T03D3811:175a-44: kun tu ston pa ni tshig lhug pa'i snyan dngags so //
T03D3811:175a-45: ba shi kh'a ni lam mo //
T03D3811:175a-46: shi pi ka ni shi ba khur ba'i phyogs so //
T03D3811:175a-47: mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba dang mi ldan pa
T03D3811:175a-48: yid la byed pa ni dga' ba rnams dang yang
T03D3811:175b-0: @175b dag par sbyor bar 'dod pas so //
T03D3811:175b-1: mi dga' ba dang bral bar 'dod pas so //
T03D3811:175b-2: mi ldan pa ni nges par phangs pa'i gang zhig yid la byed pa rnams so //
T03D3811:175b-3: 'tsho ba'i don du yo byad rnams ni 'tsho ba'i yo byad do //
T03D3811:175b-4: bzhad gad ni sngon gyi gtam mo //
T03D3811:175b-5: la gcan gyi cho lo ni cho lo ste lta ba ni tha snyad du de lta ba'o //
T03D3811:175b-6: bar chad byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnam par grags par 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3811:175b-7: rnyed pa ni chos gos la sogs pa thob pa'o //
T03D3811:175b-9: tshigs su bcad pa ni grags pa'o //
T03D3811:175b-10: de rnams kyi ro myang ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
T03D3811:175b-11: chog shes med pa dang 'dod pa che ba la sogs pa la sbyor bas bar du gcod pa'o //
T03D3811:175b-12: sems la gdung ba ni chos gos la sogs pas phongs pa rnams kyis so //
T03D3811:175b-13: zab mo zab pa dag ces bya ba ni 'dir
T03D3811:175b-14: chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid zab pa ni
T03D3811:175b-15: ma yin no // 'on kyang gang zag gi bdag
T03D3811:175b-16: med pa bstan pa nyid de mu stegs pa rnams
T03D3811:175b-17: la de'i dbang gis 'os pa'i phyir zab pa'o //
T03D3811:175b-18: dge slong gi cha byad kyis zhes bya ba ni de'i ngag blang bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:175b-19: stong pa nyid la sogs pa nye bar bstan pa
T03D3811:175b-20: la yang ji ltar rnyed pa rnams la 'dod pa
T03D3811:175b-21: zhes gsungs pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba ste
T03D3811:175b-22: / stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnams la yang
T03D3811:175b-23: gang zag gi bdag med pa la sogs ltos pas
T03D3811:175b-24: 'du byed thams cad bdag dang bral ba nyid kyis
T03D3811:175b-25: yid la byed cing stong pa nyid kyi ting nge
T03D3811:175b-26: 'dzin las mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba nyid
T03D3811:175b-27: du yid la byed cing de'i 'du byed mtshan ma
T03D3811:175b-28: med pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan ma med pa'i ting
T03D3811:175b-29: / nge 'dzin no // 'du byed thams cad sdug
T03D3811:175b-30: bsngal ba nyid kyi smon pa'i yul zhes smon pa
T03D3811:175b-32: ting nge 'dzin 'di rnams kyang 'byung ba yin nom
T03D3811:175b-33: / chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid ni las
T03D3811:175b-34: dang po pa la skyon dang bcas pa ste rang
T03D3811:175b-35: gi dman pa'i byang chub la ltung ba yang dag
T03D3811:175b-37: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang /
T03D3811:175b-38: chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyis so sor
T03D3811:175b-39: kun tu rtog pa kun rdzob kyi shes pa dang
T03D3811:175b-40: snying rjes sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu
T03D3811:175b-41: phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa de byang chub chen
T03D3811:175b-42: po thob pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa ste /
T03D3811:176a-0: de rnams la med ces dman pa'i @176a * //
T03D3811:176a-1: byang chub la ltung ba'i dogs pas rnam pa thams cad du de rnams bsal ba'o //
T03D3811:176a-2: 'di'i 'og tu bral ba rnams ni phal cher brjod par bya ba ste /
T03D3811:176a-3: de rnams chos smra ba pos chos thos pa rnams
T03D3811:176a-4: dang lhan cig tu tshogs pa dang bral ba'i chos
T03D3811:176a-5: kyi smra ba po ni smra ba po'i bla ma'o
T03D3811:176a-6: // chos nyan pa dag ni chos thos pa la
T03D3811:176a-7: dgos pa 'di la yod pas na chos thos pa
T03D3811:176a-8: // ste slob ma'o // tshogs pa dang bral bas zhes bya ba la /
T03D3811:176a-9: tshogs rnams kyi ngo bo ni tshogs pa ste /
T03D3811:176a-10: de log pa las tshogs pa dang bral ba'o //
T03D3811:176a-11: 'dun pa ni 'dod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
T03D3811:176a-13: phal cher khyim pa rnams la bya ba mang ba nyid do //
T03D3811:176a-14: tha na zhes bya ba ni lhag pa med pa la bri bar 'dod pa'o //
T03D3811:176a-15: rtogs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sgra shes pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:176a-16: dran pa dang ldan pa ni gnyi ga 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:176a-17: 'gro bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni las dang byed pa po la sbyor ba ste /
T03D3811:176a-18: 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:176a-19: 'dis ni nyan pa po'i 'dun pa'i yul las ston
T03D3811:176a-20: pa po'i 'dun pa tha dad pa'i yul nyid mngon
T03D3811:176a-21: par brjod pa'o // mgo smos pas go ba ni
T03D3811:176a-22: spyir brjod pa la khyad par shes pa'i phyir ro
T03D3811:176a-23: par brjod pa'o // // spros te go ba ni
T03D3811:176a-24: cung zad rnam par phye nas ma lus pa yongs
T03D3811:176a-26: mngon par shes pa ni tshig la rtse gcig pa'o //
T03D3811:176a-27: de ni gang zhig brjod pa de nyid shes pa ste lhag ma ni ma yin no //
T03D3811:176a-28: zang zing lhur byed pa ni zang zing ni rdzas
T03D3811:176a-29: te de lhur byed pa ni mang bar rlom sems
T03D3811:176a-30: 'di la yod pas na zang zing lhur byed pa'o
T03D3811:176a-31: // de bzhin du chos gos la sogs pa lhur byed pa'o //
T03D3811:176a-32: 'dod pa chung ba ni ci tsam gyis rang nyid
T03D3811:176a-33: 'jug pa de tsam 'dod pas na 'dod pa chung
T03D3811:176a-34: ba'o // chog shes pa ni lhag pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:176a-35: rab tu dben pa ni mang ba dang lhan cig tu mi rtsom pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:176a-36: dad par gyur cing 'di brtsam par 'dod pa ni sgra las so //
T03D3811:176a-37: don khong du chud par 'dod pa ni don las so //
T03D3811:176a-38: nor yongs su btang bar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su btang bar 'dod pa ste /
T03D3811:176a-39: ltos pa med par sbyin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:176a-40: chos smra ba po ni 'chad par mi 'gyur te
T03D3811:176b-0: dad pa dang @176b mi ldan pa'i phyir dang nor
T03D3811:176b-1: don du mi gnyer ba'i phyir dang chos la ser
T03D3811:176b-3: rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:176b-4: mdo sde de rnams ni nyan par 'dod pa'o //
T03D3811:176b-5: chos kyi bar chad du gyur pa zhes bya ba la /
T03D3811:176b-6: chos kyi bar chad ni tshogs pa dang mi ldan pas nyan pa med pa'o //
T03D3811:176b-7: de 'di la yod pas na chos kyi bar chad du gyur pa ste /
T03D3811:176b-9: med pa'am zhes bya ba ni yod par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T03D3811:176b-10: mi 'jug na zhes bya ba ni gzhan nas 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:176b-11: ma rnyed pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni chos smra ba ma thob pa'o //
T03D3811:176b-12: mi mthun pa brjod pa ni mi mthun pa brjod pa'o //

T03D3811:198a-35: thabs mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams kyis so //

T03D3811:198a-37: yongs su bzung ba'i phyir shin tu yongs su smin

T03D3811:198b-0: ma smas zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems @198b la smas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:198b-1: ma snad pa zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i byang
T03D3811:198b-2: chub kyi yul dad pa dang brtson 'grus la sogs

T03D3811:198b-4: yang shin tu brtan pa'i don du rnam pa gzhan

T03D3811:198b-14: de la rtsa ba nyams pa'i dogs pa gsungs pa
T03D3811:198b-15: ni de'i rdzas kyang gzhan du 'gyur la zhes bya

T03D3811:198b-41: skyes nas zhes bya ba ni skye bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:198b-42: 'di la skye ba la lo 'di tsam song ba zhes bya ba'i bsdus pa'i don no //

T03D3811:199a-0: ba ni gzhan gyis yongs su ma bzung @199a *
T03D3811:199a-5: gang du zhes bya ba ni phyogs gang la'o //

T03D3811:199a-29: bsten par bya zhes bya ba ni chos ston pa'i dus su yongs su mi 'dor ba las so //
T03D3811:199a-30: bsnyen bkur bya zhes bya ba ni bsten par bya ba las so //
T03D3811:199a-31: de rnams kyis ci zhig bya zhe na /

T03D3811:199a-34: rjes su ston par 'gyur pa ni sgrub pa rnam par sbyar ba'i don du'o //
T03D3811:199a-35: gdams ngag gi rang gi ngo bo gsungs pa ni gang dag ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /

T03D3811:199a-41: skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

T03D3811:199b-1: gyis so // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3811:199b-2: pa'i sgrub pa 'di ni rnam pa bzhi ste pha

T03D3811:199b-29: gsungs pa ni / / de lta bu'i ngo bo'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba'o //

T03D3811:200a-7: // sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams las

T03D3811:200b-1: par 'jug par sbyor ba zhes brjod do //

T03D3811:204b-33: gyis byas pa'o // skad cig ma'i phyogs la ni
T03D3811:204b-34: rang gi rgyud tsam las skyes pa'i 'gag pa ni
T03D3811:204b-35: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'o //
T03D3811:204b-36: sgom pa ni yang dang yang du sems la nges par zhugs pa'o //
T03D3811:204b-37: sgom pa dang bral ba ni mngon par 'dus ma
T03D3811:204b-38: byas pas 'bad pa'i khyad par can gyi sgom pa'o
T03D3811:204b-39: // phyogs ni yul gyi khyad par ro //
T03D3811:204b-40: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni de zhes 'jug pa yin no //
T03D3811:204b-41: sus kyang zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i
T03D3811:204b-42: ngo bo nyid kyis te de rnams kyi tshad ma
T03D3811:204b-43: nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:205a-0: gal te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bya ba rnam @205a * //
T03D3811:205a-1: par 'gyur ba bong ba dang gnas pa dang ldan
T03D3811:205a-2: pa phyogs gcig pa gzhal par bya ba ni brtags
T03D3811:205a-3: pa'i rnam par 'gyur na de ltar yod pa na
T03D3811:205a-4: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs
T03D3811:205a-6: gang gi phyir de'i rnam pa dang bral ba nam
T03D3811:205a-7: mkha'i chos can de bas na de gzugs la sogs
T03D3811:205a-8: pa rnams kyis mngon par rtogs pa ma yin te
T03D3811:205a-9: / de rnams med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:205a-10: de bzhin nyid ni de rnams kyi tha mi dad
T03D3811:205a-11: pa'i ngo bo mngon par rtogs pa yin zhes bya
T03D3811:205a-12: ba'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni dri ba'o //
T03D3811:205a-13: lan ni gzugs nyid ces bya ba ste /
T03D3811:205a-14: gzugs zhes bya ba ni yongs su grub pa'i gzugs so //
T03D3811:205a-15: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3811:205a-16: kun brtags dang gzhan dbang gis gzugs la sogs pa
T03D3811:205a-17: rnams la med pa nyid kyis de'i tshe nub pa'i
T03D3811:205a-18: phyir yongs su grub pa'i gzugs la sogs pa nam
T03D3811:205a-19: mkha' dang mnyam pa rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3811:205a-20: nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i dgongs pa'o
T03D3811:205a-21: // de ltar zab pa'i chos thos pas lha rnams /
T03D3811:205a-22: bcom ldan 'das zab po zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3811:205a-23: pas mngon par bsngags nas de bzhin gshegs pa la
T03D3811:205a-24: 'dod pa chung ba nyid kyis slar yang zab pa
T03D3811:205a-25: nyid ston par byed cing zhes gsungs pa ni //
T03D3811:205a-26: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste zab
T03D3811:205a-27: pa ni gnyis kyis kun tu spyod pa med pa'i
T03D3811:205a-28: phyir ro // gting dpag dka' ba ni kun brtags dang gzhan dbang dag gis bsgribs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:205a-29: blta bar dka' ba ni 'jig rten pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:205a-30: rtogs par dka' ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs
T03D3811:205a-31: rgyas dag la yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes
T03D3811:205a-32: rab kyis mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:205a-33: byed 'dod pa mi byed pa ni brtson pa chung ba'o //
T03D3811:205a-34: gzhol bar mdzad pa ni mgu bar byed pa'o //
T03D3811:205a-35: gang du sus kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di nyid la lhag pa'i bya ba dgag pa'o //
T03D3811:205a-36: nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas las dgag pa'o //
T03D3811:205a-37: bdag zab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas byed pa po dgag pa'o //
T03D3811:205a-38: chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa nyid kyis zab
T03D3811:205b-0: pa zhes @205b bya ba ni 'ga' zhig tu 'don
T03D3811:205b-1: pa'o // chos thams cad kyi thob par bya ba
T03D3811:205b-2: de rnams 'ong ba med pa nyid kyis zab pa'o
T03D3811:205b-3: pa'o // // ngo mtshar to zhes bya ba la ni sngar ma mthong ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3811:205b-4: rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang
T03D3811:205b-5: 'bras bu la khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir ro
T03D3811:205b-6: // mi mthun pa ni bzlog pa'o //
T03D3811:205b-8: mi bzung ba'i slad du ste 'di ni gzugs so zhes mtshan mar byed pa ni 'dzin pa ste /
T03D3811:205b-9: de las gzhan ni mi 'dzin pa'o //
T03D3811:205b-10: brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis nye bar
T03D3811:205b-11: mtshon par byed pa'i le'u ni lha'i le'u ste le'u
T03D3811:205b-13: / da ni gnas brtan rab 'byor ji ltar mi
T03D3811:205b-14: 'dzin pa'i phyir chos ston par byed pa de ltar
T03D3811:205b-15: gsal bar mdzad pa ni chos thams cad dmigs su
T03D3811:205b-16: ma mchis pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3811:205b-17: ste / gzung bar nus pa'i kun brtags dang gzhan
T03D3811:205b-18: dbang gi ngo bo'i mi dmigs pa ni stong pa
T03D3811:205b-19: ste / nyid de / de'i mtshan nyid can gyi
T03D3811:205b-20: chos 'di yin la de bas na chos thams cad
T03D3811:205b-21: la de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid can gyi phyir
T03D3811:205b-22: mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan par byed pa
T03D3811:205b-23: ste / nyid de / ni / gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:205b-24: gal te nye bar dmigs pa'i ngo bor 'gyur na
T03D3811:205b-25: de'i tshe chos rnams la phan tshun du mtshan nyid
T03D3811:205b-26: mi 'dra ba'i phyir chos gcig gzhan du thogs par
T03D3811:205b-27: 'gyur ro // dper na sngon po ser po la'o //
T03D3811:205b-28: stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la thams cad du
T03D3811:205b-29: yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir gang du yang thogs
T03D3811:205b-30: pa med pa'o // 'dis ni chos rnams thams cad
T03D3811:205b-31: la sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha'
T03D3811:205b-33: kun brtags dang gzhan dbang gi ngo bo med pa'i phyir sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha' med pa'o //
T03D3811:205b-34: chos nyid kyi ngo bo la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyir skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' med pa'o //
T03D3811:205b-35: de bas na thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T03D3811:205b-36: thams cad du gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis khas blangs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3811:205b-38: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:206a-0: ji ltar nam mkha' thams cad la rjes su 'gro ba gang du yang @206a * //
T03D3811:206a-2: ci'i phyir mnyam pa nyid ces gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:206a-3: lam thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:206a-4: lam ni sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa 'des pa
T03D3811:206a-5: dag la rab tu gnas par gyur pa dngos po
T03D3811:206a-6: dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo can gzugs la
T03D3811:206a-7: sogs pa dang ri bong gi rva la sogs pa
T03D3811:206a-8: rnams te / de rnams kyi mi dmigs pa las so //
T03D3811:206a-9: gal te dngos po'i ngo bor 'gyur ba yin na gcig gzhan du thogs par 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:206a-10: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo la yang ci'i phyir gzhan du rjes su 'gro ba'i nus pa'o //
T03D3811:206a-11: gnyi ga'i ngo bo dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa nyid ni gang du yang thogs pa med pa'o //
T03D3811:206a-12: thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid ni mtshungs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3811:206a-13: gnyis su ma mchis pa'i slad du ni 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:206a-14: gnod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid 'di la yod pas na do zla'i mtshan nyid do //
T03D3811:206a-15: de med pas na do zla ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T03D3811:206a-16: mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3811:206a-17: 'gal ba can dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:206a-18: gnas ni rab tu gnas pa ste /
T03D3811:206a-19: bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnams so //
T03D3811:206a-20: de med pas na gnas med pa'o //
T03D3811:206a-21: mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du zhes
T03D3811:206a-22: bya ba ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa
T03D3811:206a-23: la gang du yang rab tu gnas pa med pa'o
T03D3811:206a-24: // ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa zhe na
T03D3811:206a-25: gang gi phyir skye ba med pa ni skye ba
T03D3811:206a-26: // dang bral ba'o // ci'i phyir skye ba med pa zhe na /
T03D3811:206a-27: skye ba thams cad la mi 'thad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3811:206a-29: gal te skye ba zhes bya ba ni chos yin
T03D3811:206a-30: par gyur na de rang las yin par 'gyur ram
T03D3811:206a-31: 'on te gzhan las yin par gyur ram /
T03D3811:206a-32: gnyi ga las yin par 'gyur ram /
T03D3811:206a-33: rgyu med pa las yin par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i brtag pa bzhi'o //
T03D3811:206a-34: de la rang las skye ba ni mi rigs te de'i tshe chos mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:206a-35: med pa'i bdag nyid la skye ba'i rgyu mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:206a-36: gal te yang skye ba'i snga rol nyid du chos yod par gyur na /
T03D3811:206a-37: de ni mi rigs te yod pa la slar skye ba mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:206b-0: yod pa la skye ba ltos par gyur pa la @206b dus thams cad du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:206b-1: nam yang skye ba med pa ni ma yin no //
T03D3811:206b-2: de bas na rang las skye ba rig pa ma yin no //
T03D3811:206b-3: gzhan las kyang skye ba mi rigs te gal te
T03D3811:206b-4: gzhan las gzhan dag skye bar 'gyur na thams cad
T03D3811:206b-5: las thams cad skye bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:206b-6: 'di ni yod par 'gyur ba yin te gzhan yang de byed de /
T03D3811:206b-7: gang du rgyu de nus pa yang 'bras bu mthong ba'i phyir rtogs pa yin te /
T03D3811:206b-8: des na rnam par gzhag pa med pa ni ma yin no //
T03D3811:206b-10: nus pa de nus pa'i rgyu la brten pa thams cad du yod par 'gyur ram /
T03D3811:206b-11: 'on te nus par bya ba la yod par 'gyur /
T03D3811:206b-12: gal te thams cad du yin na rnam par gzhag pa de'i gnas skabs kho na'o //
T03D3811:206b-13: gal te nus par bya ba la yin na nus
T03D3811:206b-14: par bya ba med pa la de la ji ltar
T03D3811:206b-15: nus pa tha dad pa brjod par bya'o //
T03D3811:206b-16: nus pa tha dad pa nyid ni de de lta
T03D3811:206b-17: bu gang gi phyir 'bras bu cung zad nyid de
T03D3811:206b-18: thams cad ni ma yin zhes sems la yang nus
T03D3811:206b-19: pa'i khyad par 'bras bu dang 'brel pa'am ma 'brel
T03D3811:206b-20: ba ste 'brel pa nyid la ni med pa la
T03D3811:206b-22: ma 'brel ba nyid la ni rnam par gzhag pa med pa nyid do //
T03D3811:206b-23: gnyi ga las skye ba la yang skyon gnyis po 'di las grol ba med do //
T03D3811:206b-24: rgyu med pa las skye ba'ang mi rigs te /
T03D3811:206b-25: dus rtag tu rnam pa thams cad kyis skye bar thal pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:206b-26: de ltar rnam par dpyad pa las don dam par skye ba mi 'thad pa'o //
T03D3811:206b-28: rang las ma yin gzhan las min //
T03D3811:206b-29: gnyi ga las min rgyu med min //
T03D3811:206b-30: dngos po gang dang gang de ni //
T03D3811:206b-31: nam yang skye ba ma yin no //
T03D3811:206b-33: ngan 'gro'i lam dang bde 'gro'i lam dang mya ngan
T03D3811:206b-34: las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni lam rnams
T03D3811:206b-35: so // de med pas lam ma mchis pa'o //
T03D3811:206b-36: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa lam thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o //
T03D3811:206b-37: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:206b-38: rjes su mthun par skyes pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su'i sgra ni 'dra ba la'o //
T03D3811:206b-39: rjes su mthun par skyes pa ni rjes su mthun par skyes pa'o //
T03D3811:206b-40: byed pa po la ni ta'i rkyen no //
T03D3811:206b-41: las kyi drug pa ste 'brel pa brjod par 'dod pas /
T03D3811:207a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su mthun @207a * //
T03D3811:207a-1: par skyes pa rab 'byor zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:207a-2: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:207a-3: de de'i rjes su mthun par skyes pa nyid ci'i phyir zhe na /
T03D3811:207a-4: lan de ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T03D3811:207a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di sras te 'dra ba yang
T03D3811:207a-6: yin la stong pa nyid smra ba'i phyir zhes bya
T03D3811:207a-7: ba dgongs pa'o // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:207a-8: ma skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rjes su

T03D3811:207a-10: // ma skyes pa nyid kyi pha dang bu dag
T03D3811:207a-11: la 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i dgongs
T03D3811:207a-12: // pa'o // gal te ma skyes pa yin na
T03D3811:207a-13: ji ltar pha dang bu dag grub pa zhes bya
T03D3811:207a-14: // pa'o // ba'i dgongs pa'o // rjes su mthun
T03D3811:207a-15: par skyes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtan
T03D3811:207a-17: rjes su mthun par skyes te /
T03D3811:207a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su
T03D3811:207a-19: 'gro ba de bas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes
T03D3811:207a-21: rjes su 'gro zhing skyes pa ni rjes su mthun par skyes pa zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
T03D3811:207a-22: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni
T03D3811:207a-23: 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa de
T03D3811:207a-24: bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid
T03D3811:207a-25: 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa zhes
T03D3811:207a-26: bya ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid
T03D3811:207a-27: dang / rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid la mnyam pa nyid ston par byed de /
T03D3811:207a-28: rjes su mthun par skyes pa nyid rab tu bsgrub
T03D3811:207a-29: pa'i don du 'ong ba yang med song ba yang
T03D3811:207a-31: gang las kyang 'ongs pa med pa gang du yang 'gro ba med pa'o //
T03D3811:207a-32: de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T03D3811:207a-33: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin dang ro gcig pa'i
T03D3811:207a-34: rtogs pa 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye
T03D3811:207a-35: shes kyi ngo bo nyid thams cad du 'gro ba'i
T03D3811:207a-36: chos kyi dbyings so sor rtogs pas bskal pa grangs
T03D3811:207a-37: med pa dang po 'das par gyur pa la /

T03D3811:207a-39: lam gyi rang bzhin sa dang po la byang chub
T03D3811:207a-40: sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par skye ba yin
T03D3811:207a-41: no // byang chub sems dpa'i sa gzhan dang gzhan
T03D3811:207a-42: rnams de bzhin nyid la gzhan dang gzhan dang gzhan
T03D3811:207b-0: gyi ngo bo @207b rtogs pa la rnam par dag
T03D3811:207b-1: no // pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la
T03D3811:207b-2: de'i rnam par dag pa ni gtan du ba yin
T03D3811:207b-3: no // pa'o // no // de ltar na de
T03D3811:207b-4: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi gsang

T03D3811:207b-6: rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi
T03D3811:207b-7: phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu kha cig bdag cag gis
T03D3811:207b-8: mi mthong zhes dmus long ltar nyi ma'i 'od zer
T03D3811:207b-9: gyis mun pa rtsa ba nas 'byin pa'i nyi ma'i
T03D3811:207b-10: dpal la sun 'byin par byed pa bag med pa

T03D3811:207b-14: snang ba tsam de snga ma dang phyi ma la
T03D3811:207b-15: rjes su mtshams sbyor ba ma yin pa rang gi
T03D3811:207b-16: cha tsam la yang tha ma yin pa'i phyir gzugs
T03D3811:207b-17: la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang phan tshun
T03D3811:207b-18: du mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i gzugs la sogs pa'i
T03D3811:207b-19: snang ba tsam las tha dad par gzhan dag gis
T03D3811:207b-20: yongs su brtags pa'i ba glang la sogs pa bzhin

T03D3811:207b-22: rkyen thams cad la rang gi cha tsam tha ma

T03D3811:207b-25: de kho na nyid rtogs pa nyid kyis so //
T03D3811:207b-26: gang gi phyir phan tshun du mtshan nyid mi 'dra

T03D3811:207b-33: rnam par rtog par byas pa'i de bzhin nyid grub pa ma yin no zhe na /

T03D3811:207b-37: pa gcig gi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //

T03D3811:207b-39: gang zag la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyi rnam par
T03D3811:207b-40: rtog pa 'gag pa'i don du kun rtags tsam gyi

T03D3811:208a-1: ma rigs pa ni skyes gyur pa //

T03D3811:224a-13: // yongs su shes pa la sems can rnams bstan

T03D3811:225a-23: gnas pa ni dman par byed pa'o //
T03D3811:225a-24: phyir mi ldog pa'i sems ni bdag nyid la phyir mi ldog pa nyid du nges pa'o //

T03D3811:225b-15: rnams so // de ni sangs rgyas rnams la gus

T03D3811:226a-42: // bstan du gsol zhes bya ba ni mtshon par gsol ba'o //

T03D3811:242b-14: de ltar 'jigs pa skyed par byed pa gang zhig spu zing ba yang byed de /
T03D3811:242b-15: phyir rgol ba ni gnyen por gyur pa don du gnyer ba rnams so //
T03D3811:242b-16: mi mdza' ba ni nor bzung bar 'dod pa'i dgra
T03D3811:242b-17: rnams gsod pa la brtson pa ni mi mdza' ba'o
T03D3811:242b-18: // shin tu mnyes gshin pa ni byams pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:242b-19: mdzangs pa ni snying rje dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //

T03D3811:242b-22: dpe'i don gnas skabs su bya ba la sbyar bar

T03D3811:242b-25: ci ltar skyes bu 'di pha ma la sogs pa

T03D3811:242b-27: mi 'gro'o // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
T03D3811:242b-28: can rnams dor nas gcig pu 'khor ba las nges
T03D3811:242b-29: par 'byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni dpe'i
T03D3811:242b-30: mi 'gro'o // don to // thabs mkhas pa ni
T03D3811:242b-31: skyes bu'i bya ba dang bcas pa tshad med pa
T03D3811:242b-33: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs
T03D3811:242b-34: su 'dris pa'i don du goms par gyur pa lam
T03D3811:242b-35: gyi ngo bo'o // 'dir byams pas sbyor ba'i gtso
T03D3811:242b-36: bo nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas gang gi tshe
T03D3811:242b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

T03D3811:242b-39: ting nge 'dzin de la zhes bya ba ni byams pa yongs su bsgom pa la'o //
T03D3811:242b-40: pha rol tu phyin pa mchog thob pa la'o //
T03D3811:243a-0: de nyid bstan par byed pa ni gang gi tshe zhes bya ba @243a * //
T03D3811:243a-2: da ni mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba ni

T03D3811:243a-4: 'dzin gyi stobs nyid kyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting
T03D3811:243a-5: nge 'dzin la yang 'gugs pa'i phyir ci zhig de

T03D3811:243a-12: ste / // stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
T03D3811:243a-13: nyid kyis mtshan ma yongs su spong ba 'grub pa
T03D3811:243a-14: la mtshan ma med pa'i sgo gzhan gyis dgos pa

T03D3811:243a-20: 'di lta ste dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

T03D3811:243a-24: brten nas zhes bya ba ni 'dug par byas nas so //
T03D3811:243a-25: gnas pa zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'o //

T03D3811:243a-27: brten pa ma yin pa ste de bas na gnas pa ma yin no ;
T03D3811:243a-28: ; stong pa nyid la mi ltung ngo zhes bya

T03D3811:243a-31: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su ma rdzogs par zhes bya ba ste /

T03D3811:243a-38: 'dzin te zhes bya ba la nam mkha' nyid la gnas par byed pa'o //
T03D3811:243a-39: ltung du mi ster ba zhes bya ba ni ltung ba'i phyir mi ster ba'o //
T03D3811:243a-40: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar steng
T03D3811:243a-41: du 'phangs pa'i mda' gzhan rnams kyis yun ring por
T03D3811:243a-42: mi ltung ba'i don du 'phong gi slob dpon gyis
T03D3811:243a-43: 'bigs pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sangs
T03D3811:243a-44: rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin pa'i bar du sems
T03D3811:243b-0: la mngon @243b du mi bya ba'i phyir sems la
T03D3811:243b-1: sems gzhan rnams kyis so sor mngon du byed ces
T03D3811:243b-2: bya ba'o // yang dag pa'i mtha' dam pa mngon

T03D3811:243b-10: 'o na ji ltar longs spyod dang sprul ba dag yang dag par 'byung /
T03D3811:243b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam
T03D3811:243b-12: gyis gdul bya rnams la skal ba ci lta bar
T03D3811:243b-13: 'di snang ba'o // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi

T03D3811:243b-15: gzhan dbang gi ngo bo sgro btags pa ma srid

T03D3811:243b-18: 'di snang ba'o // // ci ltar sgyu ma mkhan

T03D3811:243b-22: glang po la sogs pa'i sgro 'dogs shin tu phra

T03D3811:243b-25: sa'i dum bu la sogs pa chung yang ri la
T03D3811:243b-26: sogs pa'i ngo bor ma mthong nas de'i drung du
T03D3811:243b-27: nye bar song ste rang gi ngo bos sa'i dum

T03D3811:243b-30: yod pa ri'i sgro 'dogs pa chung yang yang dag

T03D3811:243b-39: shin tu smin pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi lam gyis so //

T03D3811:244a-0: @244a * // gnas dgu pa ni ting nge 'dzin skyed pa la'o //

T03D3811:244a-6: pa'i phyir ro // de ni ngo mtshar to zhes

T03D3811:244a-33: dad pa la sogs pa ni dbang po lnga dang stobs kyang lnga nyid dang /
T03D3811:244a-34: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste /
T03D3811:244a-35: gsum pa'i rgyu gsungs pa ni //
T03D3811:244a-36: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T03D3811:244a-37: chos kyi 'du shes ni phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i 'du shes so //
T03D3811:244a-38: 'gres 'di ni sngon gyi po ti rnams la yod
T03D3811:244a-39: pa ma yin te mngon rtogs dang sbyar ba'i don

T03D3811:244a-41: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rgyu bzhi pa gsungs so //
T03D3811:244b-0: bud med dang skyes pa la @244b sogs pa'i mtshan
T03D3811:244b-1: ma rnams la spyod cing de rnams kyis de spang

T03D3811:244b-5: cig ces bya ba'i srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod pa

T03D3811:244b-10: de la mi rtag pa la sogs pa nyan thos

T03D3811:244b-12: pa chen po'i lugs kyis bstan par bya'o //

T03D3811:244b-24: skye dang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T03D3811:244b-25: dri bcas dri ma med pa'i don //
T03D3811:244b-26: rtsa ba'i de nyid go rims bzhin //

T03D3811:244b-39: gzhan dbang gi ngo bo nyid ni sdug bsngal gyi

T03D3811:244b-45: nyid do // sdug bsngal ba'o // ci ltar sngon
T03D3811:244b-46: po la sogs pa rten dang 'brel pas shes kyi
T03D3811:244b-47: sngon po la sogs pa nyid kun brtags kyi ngo
T03D3811:244b-48: bo nyid la gang zhig byis pa rnams kyis gang
T03D3811:245a-1: zag gi mtshan nyid dam chos kyi mtshan nyid yongs
T03D3811:245a-2: su brtags par byed pa de nyid med pa zhes
T03D3811:245a-3: bya ba de'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa nyid 'di'i

T03D3811:245a-6: sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa 'khrul pa tsam de'i mtshan
T03D3811:245a-7: nyid yod de // ci ltar byis pa rnams kyis
T03D3811:245a-8: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i ngo bos
T03D3811:245a-9: ji ltar yongs su brtags pa de bas na de'i
T03D3811:245a-10: bdag nyid kyi bral ba nyid 'di'i bdag med pa

T03D3811:245a-13: ste gnyis med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //

T03D3811:245a-22: gsungs pa nyid kyi rgyu rnams kyi don mngon par

T03D3811:245a-30: chub sems dpa'i yongs su dri ba dang lan shes

T03D3811:245b-7: mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag par ldan pa'i
T03D3811:245b-8: phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhes bya ba bcom ldan
T03D3811:245b-10: de ltar lan ldon pa ni nyung ngo zhes bya ba ste /

T03D3811:248b-44: ming de gang yin pa zhes de'i phyir gsungs pa /
T03D3811:248b-45: des gang sems kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:249a-1: ni byang chub sems dpas so //
T03D3811:249a-2: rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3811:249a-3: rjes su rnam par bsam pa'o //
T03D3811:249a-4: 'di nyid la 'og ma dag gis rgyas par bshad
T03D3811:249a-5: pa ni rjes su brtags shing zhes bya ba ste
T03D3811:249a-6: / ci zhig bdag la de ltar mi 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //

T03D3811:249a-8: lung ston to zhes bya ba ni brjod par 'gyur ba'o //

T03D3811:249a-14: sbyangs shing dul bar gyur nas zhes bya ba ni
T03D3811:249a-15: ngan 'gro de dang de rnams las bskyod nas so
T03D3811:249a-16: // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni skye ba gzhan la'o //
T03D3811:249a-17: de yang skye ba gzhan la 'byung ba'i mngon par
T03D3811:249a-18: rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa nyid dus shin
T03D3811:249a-19: tu ring ba dang dka' bas mngon par 'dod pa'i
T03D3811:249a-20: don yang dag par sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro
T03D3811:249a-21: // gal te skye ba de nyid la byas pa'i
T03D3811:249a-22: las de nyid du gnyen po bsten pa byas par

T03D3811:249a-26: rnam pa smod par 'gyur ba ni smod pa'i gnyen pos so //
T03D3811:249a-27: byang bar byed par 'gyur ba ni kun du spyod pa'i gnyen pos so //
T03D3811:249a-28: gnong bar 'gyur ba ni rang dang gzhan la ltos pa'i ngo tsha bas so //
T03D3811:249a-29: 'dor bar 'gyur ba ni rten gyi stobs kyis so //
T03D3811:249a-30: so sor 'chags par 'gyur ba ni slar mi byed pa'i sdom pa la sogs pa 'dzin pas so //
T03D3811:249a-31: rnyed par dka' zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal bas
T03D3811:249a-32: thob par bya ba ste yang mi thob pa nyid

T03D3811:249a-35: dang lan cig gnyen po nye bar ltung ba ci
T03D3811:249a-36: zhig nus pa med pa yin nam zhe na /

T03D3811:249a-39: de srid du ches lci ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:249a-40: nyan thos kyi theg pa can zhes bya ba ni

T03D3811:249a-42: pa'i sdom pa rnam pa bdun las ldang ba'i cho
T03D3811:249a-43: ga dang de rnam par dag pa'i cho ga dang
T03D3811:249b-0: nyams pa'i cho @249b ga gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:249b-1: nyan thos kyis la zhes bya ba ni de ni
T03D3811:249b-2: dge slong gi sdom pa gzung ba gal te nyan
T03D3811:249b-3: thos kyis nyid la slob par 'dod par 'gyur ba
T03D3811:249b-4: nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'das pa thob pas
T03D3811:249b-5: de'i tshe ma thob pa yongs su nyams pas skye

T03D3811:249b-7: las yongs su nyams pa dang lhar dge sbyong gi

T03D3811:249b-9: pa'i phyir de'i zad pa chen por 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:249b-10: gal te yang byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa ba'i ltung
T03D3811:249b-11: ba de rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa
T03D3811:249b-12: nyams pa yang yod pa 'di ni rnam par nges

T03D3811:249b-15: pa'i sdom pa bzung nas byang chub sems dpa'i sdom
T03D3811:249b-16: pa yang dag par blangs pa dge sbyong gi 'bras
T03D3811:249b-17: bu las yongs su nyams pa ni de la mngon
T03D3811:249b-19: nyan thos kyi byang chub las mi 'dod pa'i phyir
T03D3811:249b-20: dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang

T03D3811:249b-22: kyi phyir de bas na de la zad pa chen

T03D3811:249b-25: bzhi zhes bya ba ni mi gsod pa dang /

T03D3811:249b-29: rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:249b-30: dge slong ma yin zhes bya ba ni dge slong gi sdom pa las nyams pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:249b-31: dge sbyong ma yin zhes bya ba ni dge sbyong
T03D3811:249b-32: gi 'bras bu rnams ma thob cing yongs su nyams

T03D3811:249b-34: dge slong gi sdom pa 'dzin pa la skal ba
T03D3811:249b-35: dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //

T03D3811:249b-37: slar rnam par dben par snang ba'i yon tan nye bar bstan pas bdud kyi las gsungs pa ni //
T03D3811:249b-38: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

T03D3811:249b-43: lus dben pa dang sems dben pa'o //

T03D3811:250a-1: bo zhes gtso bo'i don to //

T03D3811:250a-7: grong gi nang ni nye ba'am phyogs gcig go //

T03D3811:264b-0: kun tu @264b mi skrag ces bya ba ni dor ba ma yin pa'o //
T03D3811:264b-1: kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba ni rgyun gyis dor ba ma yin pa'o //

T03D3811:264b-4: tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3811:264b-5: tu phyin pa la yon tan gyis spyod do //
T03D3811:264b-6: yon tan gyi rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba rnam pa gsum du dogs nas sel bar byed de /
T03D3811:264b-7: de la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni gal

T03D3811:264b-9: // nye ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni nye bar gyur to zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //

T03D3811:265a-19: rtog pa po med rtog bya med //

T03D3811:265a-22: chos nyid khyod kyis rtogs par 'gyur //

T03D3811:266a-3: mang ba gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir nges pa'i don yongs su 'dzin pa'i don du gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:266a-4: gang chos rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

T03D3811:266a-7: kyis gnod par gyur pa rnams la yang sems can

T03D3811:266b-7: chos de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

T03D3811:267a-17: rab 'byor de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pas don no //

T03D3811:267a-25: rab rab 'byor gzhan yang gang dag ces bya ba la sogs pas so //
T03D3811:267a-26: yang de dag kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T03D3811:267a-27: rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /

T03D3811:267a-29: mos pa zhes bya ba ni zhi ba rnams slar mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //

T03D3811:267a-35: rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

T03D3811:270b-24: bcom ldan 'das ma la sdud pa po zhes bya
T03D3811:270b-25: ba'o // de 'di gnyis kyang slob dpon dbyig gnyen zhabs kyi rjes su bzhed pa ma yin te /
T03D3811:270b-26: skyabs gsum gyi brtag pa las 'di skad gsungs te /
T03D3811:270b-27: chos gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de
T03D3811:270b-28: yi ge dang tshig de nyid kyis gsal bar byed
T03D3811:270b-29: pa dang / go ri mas de nyid kyis yang
T03D3811:270b-30: dag par 'dzin pa dang bstan pa nyung ba dang
T03D3811:270b-31: lhag ma med pa phyin ci ma log pa de'i
T03D3811:270b-32: tshe gzhung 'di 'phags pa dpal dbyangs kyis gsungs pa
T03D3811:270b-34: yi ge rnams yang dag par yongs su skyong ba
T03D3811:270b-35: la don yang phyin ci log par 'byung ba'i phyir
T03D3811:270b-36: zhes bya ba'o // de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa
T03D3811:270b-37: kun dga' bos gsungs pa mngon sum du bdag gis
T03D3811:270b-38: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas chos 'di rnams thos
T03D3811:270b-39: pa dang mngon sum du bzung ba'o //
T03D3811:270b-40: 'dir ni da ltar yi ge nyid dang tshig de
T03D3811:270b-41: nyid dang go ri mas de nyid kyis nyung ba
T03D3811:270b-42: dang lhag pa med pa phyin ci ma log pa
T03D3811:270b-43: dag gis so sor rjes su brjod pa zhes bya
T03D3811:270b-45: de nyid kyi phyir mdo dang mdo las bstan pa
T03D3811:271a-0: ni don bzang po dang tshig 'bru bzang po @271a
T03D3811:271a-1: * // dang ma 'dres pa dang yongs su rdzogs
T03D3811:271a-2: pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par ro
T03D3811:271a-3: * // // gzhan du na yig 'bru bzang po
T03D3811:271a-4: zhes bya ba sdud pa po bdag nyid la bstod
T03D3811:271a-5: pa byas par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:271a-6: gang zhig yang nyi khri gzhung 'grel las shes rab
T03D3811:271a-7: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag na rdo
T03D3811:271a-8: rje nyid sdud pa po zhes bya ba gsal ba
T03D3811:271a-9: nyid du brjod par mdzad do //
T03D3811:271a-10: de bas na shin tu yongs su gsal bas zhes bya ba la don ni 'di yin te /
T03D3811:271a-11: gsung rab kyi sdud pa ni rnam pa mang bas lan mang du mang bo rnams kyis byas so //
T03D3811:271a-12: de la sde pa'i gzhung rnams nyid bcom ldan 'das
T03D3811:271a-13: bzhugs par gyur pa nyid la gang gis ci ltar
T03D3811:271a-14: thos pa des 'brel ba'i go rims bstan pa'i sngon
T03D3811:271a-15: du 'gro bas bsdus nas sde pa'i gzhung nyid 'dzin
T03D3811:271a-16: pa'o // gzhan du na pha rol po rnams la
T03D3811:271a-17: ci zhig bstan par 'gyur 'grel ba'i go rims med
T03D3811:271a-18: pas se'u bcu la sogs pa'i ngag bzhin du thams
T03D3811:271a-20: sdud pa chen po'i mdo las kyang gsungs pa yin te /
T03D3811:271a-21: gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang
T03D3811:271a-22: bas bcom ldan 'das kyi mngon sum nyid du sdud
T03D3811:271a-23: pa byas so // phyis bcom ldan 'das yongs su
T03D3811:271a-24: mya ngan las 'das pa la mu stegs pa rnams
T03D3811:271a-25: ltar bstan pa du ba'i mtha' can du ma gyur
T03D3811:271a-26: cig ces bya ba 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po
T03D3811:271a-27: la sogs pa rnams kyis sdud par bgyis so //
T03D3811:271a-28: de bas na 'dir yang 'phags pa phyag na rdo
T03D3811:271a-29: rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po
T03D3811:271a-30: rnams de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las
T03D3811:271a-31: 'das pa la ci srid du theg pa chen po'i
T03D3811:271a-32: chos la sdud par mi bgyid pa de srid du
T03D3811:271a-33: bcom ldan 'das ma 'di gnas brtan kun dga' bos
T03D3811:271a-34: kyang 'grel pa'i go rims nye bar bstan te sdud
T03D3811:271a-35: nas pha rol po rnams la bstan pa'i don du
T03D3811:271a-37: des na gsungs pa yi ge dang tshig dang gsal
T03D3811:271a-38: byed shin tu gsal bas tshig 'bru dang nges pa'i
T03D3811:271a-39: tshig bzang por gzung bar bya'o //
T03D3811:271a-40: gang yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yi ge rnams
T03D3811:271a-41: gsungs pa de rnams nyid shin tu yongs su gsal
T03D3811:271a-42: ba de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i
T03D3811:271b-0: yi ge rnams la nyams par ma byed @271b cig
T03D3811:271b-1: ces bya ba'i ched du mdzad pa'i don to //
T03D3811:271b-2: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas de rnams kyi yi ge
T03D3811:271b-3: de rnams zhes bya ba le'u brgyad pa las bstan
T03D3811:271b-4: to // gtan tshigs gsungs pa ni de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:271b-5: chos kyi sku tshad mar byas te zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3811:271b-6: bstan pa'i chos kyi sku dang rtogs pa'i chos kyi sku'o //
T03D3811:271b-7: de rnams gnyis la yang tshad mar byas nas so //
T03D3811:271b-8: gang gi phyir bstan pa'i chos rnams kyi nang nas 'di ni gtso bo'o //
T03D3811:271b-9: rtogs pa'i chos kyi sku ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsdus pas so //
T03D3811:271b-10: 'ga' zhig tu chos kyi sku nyid ces bya ba'i
T03D3811:271b-11: chos nyid de la tshad mar byas nas zhes bya
T03D3811:271b-12: ba'i 'don pa'o // de dang de zhes bya ba
T03D3811:271b-13: bshad par gyur pa'i bya ba la sogs pas 'brel
T03D3811:271b-14: ba'i 'don pa'o // bar bya'o // phan par sems
T03D3811:271b-15: pa ni mi 'dod pa las sel bar rtsom pa'o
T03D3811:271b-16: ba'i 'don pa'o // bar bya'o // // dga' ba ni mnyes gshin pa'o //
T03D3811:271b-17: gus pa ni yon tan gyi khyad par bsgom pas byas pa'i mi 'da' ba nyid do //
T03D3811:271b-18: dge ba ni nad med pa la sogs pa thob pa'o //
T03D3811:271b-19: bde bar gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar gnas pa'o //
T03D3811:271b-20: bgyi ba ni bsnyen bkur la sogs pa'o //
T03D3811:271b-21: dbul ba ni me tog la sogs pa'o //
T03D3811:271b-22: bsam par bya ba ni ci ltar bcom ldan 'das
T03D3811:271b-23: yod ces bya ba dus thams cad bsam pa'i phyir
T03D3811:271b-24: yon tan dang ldan pa des de dang de'i yon
T03D3811:271b-25: tan mngon du phyogs par byas pas so //
T03D3811:271b-26: bshad na zhes bya ba ni bshad par nus pa'o //
T03D3811:271b-27: bskal pa'am ci srid du cung zad lhag ma'i bskal par 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:271b-28: de'i 'og tu gal te rgyas par 'dod par gyur
T03D3811:271b-29: na'o na ci zhig mdor bsdus nas kun dga' bo
T03D3811:271b-31: ci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:271b-32: kun dga' bo de lta bas na zhes bya ba
T03D3811:271b-33: ni gang gi phyir bskal pa bye ba yang 'di'i
T03D3811:271b-34: yongs su gtad pa las brtsams te /
T03D3811:271b-35: bstan par nus pa de'i phyir tshad med pa'i yon
T03D3811:271b-36: tan dang sbyor bas bcom ldan 'das ma tshad med
T03D3811:271b-37: pa de bas na yongs su gtad pa yang tshad
T03D3811:271b-38: med pa'o // rab tu 'jig pa'i tshe rjes su
T03D3811:271b-39: yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni
T03D3811:271b-40: gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i nye bar bstan pa'i don
T03D3811:272a-0: med pa'o // las 'jig pa'o // byi ba la sogs pa'i nye bar @272a * //
T03D3811:272a-1: 'tshe ba las glegs bam las 'jig cing so sor byed pa'o //
T03D3811:272a-2: kun dga' po de lta bas na zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:272a-3: gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
T03D3811:272a-4: yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
T03D3811:272a-5: nges par 'byung ba de bas na lan gnyis su
T03D3811:272a-6: yongs su sbyin pa dang yongs su gtad do dang
T03D3811:272a-7: yang dag par gtad pa zhes bya ba don gcig
T03D3811:272a-8: go // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing rjes su
T03D3811:272a-9: bskor nas zhes bya ba ni chos ni bden pa
T03D3811:272a-10: rnam pa bzhi ste 'phags pa rnams kyi shes bya
T03D3811:272a-11: ba yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ni shes bya ste
T03D3811:272a-12: shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yongs su
T03D3811:272a-13: bskor ba de rnams las 'byung ngo //
T03D3811:272a-14: chos de rnams kyi 'khor lo ni tshogs te de
T03D3811:272a-15: gal te gdul bya ba'i rgyud la rab tu bskor
T03D3811:272a-16: ba ni bstan pa'i stobs kyis de'i rtogs pa bskyed
T03D3811:272a-17: pa'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo ni mthong ba'i lam
T03D3811:272a-18: du brjod do // de bas na ci ltar thams
T03D3811:272a-19: cad dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bya ba
T03D3811:272a-20: zhes bya ba ci ltar brjod /
T03D3811:272a-21: chos bstan pa gang gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob
T03D3811:272a-22: pa de chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba
T03D3811:272a-23: brjod pa ma yin no zhe na /
T03D3811:272a-24: bden mod kyi sngar byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma
T03D3811:272a-25: rnams la bdag gi nyan thos khyod kyis nyan thos
T03D3811:272a-26: kyi bya ba ma byas par 'gyur zhes bya ba
T03D3811:272a-27: 'di tsam nyid brjod pa yin no //
T03D3811:272a-28: chen mo rnams la yang da ltar yang bdag gi
T03D3811:272a-29: nyan thos khyod kyis nyan thos kyi bya ba ma
T03D3811:272a-30: byas par 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di tsam 'don pa
T03D3811:272a-31: yin no // de bas na chos kyi 'khor lo'i
T03D3811:272a-32: sgra don nyid mi shes pa mi mkhas pa 'ga'
T03D3811:272a-33: zhig gis 'di bsnan pa kho na'o //
T03D3811:272a-34: chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgras chos bstan pa tsam brjod
T03D3811:272a-35: par bya zhes bya ba'i bshad pa gsung rab kyi
T03D3811:272a-36: rim pa la mkhas pa rnams ni rjes su sems
T03D3811:272a-38: chu tshod ni chu tshod do //
T03D3811:272a-39: chu tshod kyi bar ni de'i yang cha'o //
T03D3811:272a-40: thad cig ni yud tsam sum cu'o //
T03D3811:272a-41: de'i skad cig drug cu ni yud tsam mo //
T03D3811:272a-42: skad cig tsam ni skad cig ma brgya nyi shu'o //
T03D3811:272a-43: dus kyi mtha' ni skad cig ma'o //
T03D3811:272a-44: skad cig ma la sogs pa gzung ba ni rim
T03D3811:272a-45: pa ci lta bar dbang po rnon po dang 'bring
T03D3811:272a-46: dang rtul po'i gang zag gis shes pa'i don du'o
T03D3811:272b-0: // bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid 'dir skad cig mar shes par @272b bya ste /
T03D3811:272b-1: gcig la tha snyad bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir
T03D3811:272b-2: zhes bya ba slob dpon rnam par grol ba'i sde'o
T03D3811:272b-3: // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba
T03D3811:272b-4: la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa sangs
T03D3811:272b-5: rgyas kyi zhing dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa
T03D3811:272b-6: yang dag par bstan pa ste /
T03D3811:272b-7: slar de yang dag par ston pa ni de la 'dod pa bskyed pa'i don du'o //
T03D3811:272b-8: yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye
T03D3811:272b-9: ba'i phyir dang gdul bya ba rnams kyi smon lam
T03D3811:272b-10: gyi don du rgya che ba la mos pa'i byang
T03D3811:272b-11: chub sems dpa' rnams la dga' ba bskyed pa'i don
T03D3811:272b-12: du zhes bya ba ni slob dpon snga ma rnams
T03D3811:272b-13: so // rgya mtsho lta bu zhes bya ba ni shin tu rgya che ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:272b-14: zab pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi yon tan shes par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:272b-15: mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa nyid
T03D3811:272b-16: thob pas bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis 'bigs par
T03D3811:272b-17: bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:272b-18: yang mi snang bar 'gyur ba ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3811:272b-19: 'dir yang skabs 'dis stong pa nyid bstan pa rgyas pa'i don du'o //
T03D3811:272b-20: chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya bar bgrang ba rnams so //
T03D3811:272b-21: mig lam du yang zhes bya ba ni nye bar
T03D3811:272b-22: mtshon pa ste rna ba la sogs pa rnams la
T03D3811:272b-23: yang ngo // chos rnams zhes bya ba ni sems dang sems las byung bar bgrang ba rnams so //
T03D3811:272b-24: chos rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni de 'dzin pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dod pa rnams so //
T03D3811:272b-25: slar chos rnams zhes bya ba ni da ltar byung
T03D3811:272b-26: ba 'dzin pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dod pa rnams
T03D3811:272b-27: so // chos rnams zhes bya ba ni da ltar
T03D3811:272b-28: byung ba nyid gzung ba nyid kyis mngon par 'dod
T03D3811:272b-29: so // pa rnams so // chos rnams kyis chos
T03D3811:272b-30: rnams mi shes so zhes bya ba ni 'das pa
T03D3811:272b-31: dang ma 'ongs pa 'dzin pa nyid kyis mngon par
T03D3811:272b-33: ma 'ongs pa nyid gzung ba nyid kyis mngon par 'dod pa rnams la mi shes so //
T03D3811:272b-34: chos thams cad ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas rigs pa gsungs so //
T03D3811:272b-35: 'dzin pa la rag las pa ni gzung pa'i rnam
T03D3811:272b-36: par gzhag pa de'i phyir 'dzin pa med pa dang
T03D3811:272b-37: por gsungs so // ci'i phyir zhe na /
T03D3811:272b-38: shes pa po ma yin pa dang mthong ba po ma yin pa'o //
T03D3811:273a-2: dgos pa byed nus pa ma yin no //
T03D3811:273a-3: 'dir dgos pa ni gzung bar 'dod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T03D3811:273a-4: de la yang 'thad pa gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:273a-5: byed pa med pa zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:273a-6: lus kyi bya ba dang bral ba'i phyir gang la yang 'dzin pa po ma yin no //
T03D3811:273a-7: 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir don gyis grub pa gzung ba rnams kyi med pa gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:273a-8: gzung ba med pa zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:273a-9: nam mkha' byed pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba
T03D3811:273a-10: ste sngar gsungs pa'i byed pa med pa la gtan
T03D3811:273a-11: tshigs so // de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i
T03D3811:273a-12: ngo bo med pa'i phyir kun brtags med pa zhes
T03D3811:273a-13: tshigs so // gsungs so // gal te de ltar
T03D3811:273a-14: na ri bong gi rva bzhin du chos thams cad
T03D3811:273a-15: la rnam pa thams cad du med par 'gyur zhes
T03D3811:273a-16: tshigs so // gsungs so // gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:273a-17: kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i skyes
T03D3811:273a-18: bu ltar bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya ba
T03D3811:273a-19: tshigs so // gsungs so // gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:273a-20: ste / 'dis ni brdzun pa snang ba tsam gyi
T03D3811:273a-21: ngo bo gzhan dbang yod pa dang med pa nyid
T03D3811:273a-22: kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yod pa'i ngo bo
T03D3811:273a-23: tshigs so // gsungs so // gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:273a-24: ste / gsungs so // gal te de ltar yin
T03D3811:273a-25: na don dam par thams cad med par 'gyur zhes
T03D3811:273a-27: tshor ba po ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:273a-28: yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo ni don dam par
T03D3811:273a-29: tha dad pas gang gi yang tshor ba po ma
T03D3811:273a-30: yin te / de'i tshe shes pa la shes bya dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:273a-31: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni //
T03D3811:273a-32: gnyis med dngos po med pa yi /
T03D3811:273a-33: yod pa stong pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T03D3811:273a-35: de ltar spyod na zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T03D3811:273a-36: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa
T03D3811:273a-37: la bsngags pa'o // bslab pa'am chos thams cad kyi
T03D3811:273a-38: dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob
T03D3811:273a-39: par 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyi
T03D3811:273a-40: sgras mnyam pa'i don pha rol gyi sgra yang yod
T03D3811:273a-41: de de bas na pha rol gyi dngos po ni
T03D3811:273a-42: pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do //
T03D3811:273a-43: lung las kyang dngos po'i rkyen gyi mtha' can gyis kyang chos kho na mngon par brjod do //
T03D3811:273a-44: ci ltar gsher pa ni chu'i khams te gsher ba nyid chu'i khams zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:273a-45: de bas na chos rnams thams cad kyi mchog gi
T03D3811:273a-46: mtha' thob par 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i don to
T03D3811:273b-0: // @273b po ti rnyid pa rnams las 'di ltar 'don pa ste /
T03D3811:273b-1: dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i byang chub chen po zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:273b-2: mngon rtogs dang sbyar ba'i chags pas byang chub chen po zhes bya ba ni bsnan pa'o //
T03D3811:273b-3: sangs rgyas rnams la yang phan par mdzad pa zhes
T03D3811:273b-4: gsungs pa ni kun dga' bo bslab pa 'di la
T03D3811:273b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:273b-6: chags pa med pa nyid ces bya ba ni dmigs
T03D3811:273b-7: pa dang bral ba nyid dam thogs pa med pa'i
T03D3811:273b-9: tshad ma ni rgya che ba'i nges pa'o //
T03D3811:273b-10: zad pa ni dus kyi nges pa'o //
T03D3811:273b-12: med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni
T03D3811:273b-13: ri bong gi rva bzhin du kun brtags rnam pa
T03D3811:273b-14: thams cad du med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:273b-15: gzhan dbang med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa tsam nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3811:273b-16: yongs su grub pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba
T03D3811:273b-17: ni rang nyid kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
T03D3811:273b-19: tshad ma dang 'brel ba zhes bya ba ni tshad mas yongs su gcod pa'o //
T03D3811:273b-20: dben pa dmigs su med na zhes bya ba ni
T03D3811:273b-21: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bos zhes bya ba'o
T03D3811:273b-22: // gzhal du med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:273b-24: yongs su zad pa ni dngos po med pa'o //
T03D3811:273b-25: slar po ti 'ga' zhig la dus gsum bstan pas
T03D3811:273b-26: kyang so sor zad pa'am ma zad par 'gyur ba'am
T03D3811:273b-27: zad bzhin pa zhes bya ba dus gsum la yang
T03D3811:273b-28: zad pa med pa 'don pa yin no //
