T03D3811:300a-9: 'byung ba de'i tshe btang snyoms zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:300a-10: de me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal du sgom par byed de /
T03D3811:300a-11: rdzing bu brgyad brgyad ces bya ba ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'o //
T03D3811:300a-12: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po bsgom pa la
T03D3811:300a-13: rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i de dang
T03D3811:300a-14: de'i yan lag bsgom pa la ngal ba bsal brgyu
T03D3811:300a-16: de la gang zhig sngar rgyu med pa dang mi
T03D3811:300a-17: mnyam pa'i rgyu nyid ma brten pas bde ba rnams
T03D3811:300a-18: la phyin ci ma log par mthong ba so sor
T03D3811:300a-19: rnyed pa de nyid thob ste shes rab gang zhig
T03D3811:300a-20: bsgom pas spong bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spang
T03D3811:300a-21: ba'i don du rnam par gzhag par byed pa de
T03D3811:300a-22: ni yang dag pa'i lta ba ste yan lag dang
T03D3811:300a-23: po'o // de bzhin du yang dag pa'i lta ba
T03D3811:300a-24: dang par byas nas nges par 'byung ba la sogs
T03D3811:300a-25: pa yang dag par rtog pa ni yang dag pa'i
T03D3811:300a-26: po'o // rtog pa'o // brdzun dang phra ma la sogs pa'i tshig las log pa dang /
T03D3811:300a-27: chos kyi gtam ni yang dag pa'i dag go //
T03D3811:300a-28: srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dar
T03D3811:300a-29: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i log pa'i las kyi
T03D3811:300a-31: zag pa med pa'i lam gyi yan lag tu gyur
T03D3811:300a-32: pa de bzhin du chos kyi bsod snyoms dang chos
T03D3811:300a-33: gos la sogs pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir yang
T03D3811:300a-35: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni log pa'i 'tsho ba la sogs pa so sor rtogs nas log pa'o //
T03D3811:300a-36: yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa la brten
T03D3811:300a-37: pas bsgom pa la sbyor ba'i 'dun pa dang brtson
T03D3811:300a-38: 'grus gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i rtsol
T03D3811:300a-39: ba'o // yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang ldan pa'i
T03D3811:300a-40: gang zhig dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhin yid
T03D3811:300b-0: la byed cing sems gnas @300b pa de ni yang
T03D3811:300b-2: gong nas gong du bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa 'grib
T03D3811:300b-3: pa'i phyir 'jug pa bden pa'i mtshan nyid gnas pa
T03D3811:300b-4: dang sems rtse gcig pa'i khyad par ni yang dag
T03D3811:300b-6: de ltar na yan lag brgyad po 'di rnams bsgoms
T03D3811:300b-7: pa las skyes pa'i dal ba bsal ba'i don du
T03D3811:300b-8: gang rnams la khrus byed pa dang zhugs pa la
T03D3811:300b-9: sogs pa spyod pa de rnams rim pa ci lta
T03D3811:300b-10: bar bzang po dang shin tu bzang po nyid dang
T03D3811:300b-11: ldan pa don ci lta bar ming gis tha snyad
T03D3811:300b-12: du byas pa'i rdzing bu rnams so //
T03D3811:300b-13: nges pa zhes bya ba ni dran pas des pa'i chos la nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:300b-14: mi 'bab ces bya ba la 'bab pa ni 'di dang de las sems 'khor ba'o //
T03D3811:300b-15: de la ting nge 'dzin gyi gsal ba ste /
T03D3811:300b-16: de dang ldan pas mi 'bab pa'o //
T03D3811:300b-17: them skas nyid ni them pa'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir them pa'o //
T03D3811:300b-19: de la bar ni go skabs so //
T03D3811:300b-20: ldan pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan de rnams nyid kyis yang dag par shar ba'o //
T03D3811:300b-21: dbang du gyur pa ni dbang po thams cad kyis
T03D3811:300b-22: rjes su bzung ba ste de dang ldan pas na
T03D3811:300b-24: rtse ba zhes bya ba la sog pa ni bshad zin to //
T03D3811:300b-25: ji ltar sems can rnams kyi tshogs 'phel ba de
T03D3811:300b-26: thams cad lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi
T03D3811:300b-27: sems can yongs su smin pa'i don du sten par
T03D3811:300b-28: byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ltung ba med
T03D3811:300b-29: par 'gyur ro // ma lus rgyal dang nyon mongs bcom //
T03D3811:300b-30: dug ni sngags kyis bcom pa ltar //
T03D3811:300b-31: nyon mongs kyis ni nyon mongs zad //
T03D3811:300b-32: de rnams thams cad mkhyen nyid thob //
T03D3811:300b-33: ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
T03D3811:300b-34: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T03D3811:300b-35: dran pa'i ye shes kyi ni bcom pa sna tshogs yon tan 'grub pas spang pa ste //
T03D3811:300b-36: nyon mongs rnams ni khyed kyi byang chub nye bar mkho ba nyid du son pa yin /
T03D3811:300b-38: dus de srid du zhes bya ba ni dus nyung ba'o //
T03D3811:300b-39: gser gyi rkang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas gdan gyi khyad par te /
T03D3811:300b-40: 'phang du rgyang grags phyed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3811:300b-41: shing bal bting ba'am bar tshang can bting ba ste
T03D3811:300b-42: bar tshad ma ni la ba'i rigs khyad par can
T03D3811:300b-43: no // snying po can ni tsan ni'i gos bting ba'o //
T03D3811:301a-1: 'di'i steng du yod pas na steng snying po can no //
T03D3811:301a-2: snying po can ni sngas nang tshangs can zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag go //
T03D3811:301a-3: ka shi ka'i gos ni b'a r'a ni s'i nas byung ba'am lha las byung ba'o //
T03D3811:301a-4: de bting ba 'di la yod pas na de ltar brjod pa'o //
T03D3811:301a-5: ci ltar mnyam par gyur pa ni mnyam pa ni ma yin pa de ltar 'dzin pa'o //
T03D3811:301a-6: lhan cig tu zhes bya ba ni skye bo rnams
T03D3811:301a-7: ci tsam gyis 'dzin pa de tsam 'dus pa tshang
T03D3811:301a-8: ba'o // bres pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa dang bcas pa'o //
T03D3811:301a-9: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:301a-10: ci 'di legs par gnas sam zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:301a-11: yang bar snang la rten med par 'dzin par ci ltar nus she na gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:301a-12: legs par gnas pa sna tshogs pa rnam par smin pas zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:301a-13: legs par gnas pa des gnas par bya zhes bya
T03D3811:301a-14: ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i las kyi rnam par
T03D3811:301a-15: smin pa'i stobs nyid las bar snang du byang chub
T03D3811:301a-16: sems dpa' la gnas zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:301a-17: mu tig gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni mtha'
T03D3811:301a-18: ma rnams su dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa
T03D3811:301a-20: dbus su mu tig gi tshogs rags pa'o //
T03D3811:301a-21: mngon par gtor ba ni mngon du phyogs shing dor ba'o //
T03D3811:301a-22: rab tu gtor ba ni logs gsum la'o //
T03D3811:301a-23: yang dag par gtor ba ni slar yang logs bzhi la'o //
T03D3811:301a-24: chos kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya
T03D3811:301a-25: ba la chos ni de rnams kyi dad pa dang
T03D3811:301a-26: 'dun pa dag la rnam par dag pa gang yin
T03D3811:301a-27: pa'o // chos la gus pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:301a-28: rten pa ni snod du rung ba nyid do //
T03D3811:301a-29: log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te zhes bya ba ni ngan 'gror 'gro ba ma yin pa'o //
T03D3811:301a-30: rgyun ma bcad pa ni chad pa dang bral ba'o //
T03D3811:301a-31: yid la byed pa zhes bya ba ni shes rab
T03D3811:301a-32: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa'i yid la
T03D3811:301a-33: byed pa'o // dga' ba zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang ldan pa'o //
T03D3811:301a-34: mgu ba zhes bya ba ni yid bde ba thob pa'o //
T03D3811:301a-35: mchog gi sgra ni nye bar sbyar ba dang bcas
T03D3811:301a-36: pa yid bde ba la yang mthong zhes bya ba
T03D3811:301a-37: ni rnam bshad rigs pas so //
T03D3811:301a-38: yi rangs pa ni de la rtse gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3811:301a-39: rab tu mgu ba ni dga' ba 'phel ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:301b-0: dga' ba dang yid bde ba ni dga' @301b bas lhan cig tu byas pa'i rab tu dang ba'o //
T03D3811:301b-1: de 'di la skyes pas na de ltar brjod pa'o //
T03D3811:301b-2: de thos so zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba brjod
T03D3811:301b-3: par 'dod pas drug pa nye bar len pa la'o
T03D3811:301b-4: // po ti gang dag rnams las sa phyogs de
T03D3811:301b-5: nyid du 'dug pa na zhes bya ba 'di'i rjes
T03D3811:301b-6: la chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes
T03D3811:301b-7: zhes bya ba 'don par byed kyi de ston pa
T03D3811:301b-8: thos so zhes bya ba ni ma yin pa de
T03D3811:301b-9: ni 'dri mkhan rnams kyi bag med pa ste /
T03D3811:301b-10: 'og tu thos nas kyang bdag la ting nge 'dzin
T03D3811:301b-11: gyi sgo brgya phrag skyes pa zhes brjod pa'i phyir
T03D3811:301b-12: ro // chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du
T03D3811:301b-13: shes zhes bya ba ni ci ltar da lta nyid
T03D3811:301b-14: du chos 'phags kyi ston pa'i snang ba nye bar
T03D3811:301b-15: mi gnas pa de bzhin du rgyu'i nges pa la
T03D3811:301b-16: mi gnas pa'i chos thams cad don dam pa zhes
T03D3811:301b-17: bya ba'i 'du shes 'di shin tu mi rten pa'o
T03D3811:301b-18: ro // // 'du shes 'di'i mthus ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:301b-19: de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:301b-20: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sgo yin la nyon mongs
T03D3811:301b-21: pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa btang snyoms dang
T03D3811:301b-22: mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni
T03D3811:301b-23: ting nge 'dzin zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni
T03D3811:301b-24: spyir ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid do //
T03D3811:301b-25: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni kun brtags
T03D3811:301b-26: dang gzhan dbang dang yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3811:301b-27: do // de rnams la lta ba ni mthong ba po'o //
T03D3811:301b-28: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni kun brtags
T03D3811:301b-29: kyi mtshan nyid shin tu yod pa mi dmigs pa
T03D3811:301b-31: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzhan dbang
T03D3811:301b-32: gi mtshan nyid kyis shes pa gang zhig brdzun par
T03D3811:301b-33: snang ba tsam nyid kyis yongs su shes pa'o //
T03D3811:301b-34: de las nges par 'byung ba ni brdzun par snang ba tsam nyid kyis shes pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:301b-35: yang gang gi tshe shes pas nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'don pa ste /
T03D3811:301b-36: de yang ngo bo nyid kyi shes pas nges par
T03D3811:301b-37: 'byung ba shes pa'i snang ba brdzun pa nyid kyis
T03D3811:301b-38: rtogs pa'o // chos thams cad tha dad pa med
T03D3811:301b-39: pa ni mnyam pa nyid de de bzhin nyid kyis
T03D3811:301b-40: gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3811:302a-0: de dmigs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni @302a * //
T03D3811:302a-2: de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis chos thams cad 'gyur
T03D3811:302a-3: ba med par mthong ba de bas na chos thams
T03D3811:302a-4: cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba'o //
T03D3811:302a-5: chos thams cad kyi ci lta ba bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid gsum rtogs pa'o //
T03D3811:302a-6: de nyid kyi mun pa gang zhig rnam pa thams
T03D3811:302a-7: cad du rtogs pa med pa de dang bral ba'o
T03D3811:302a-8: // de nyid kyi gang zhig mi shes pa ni phyin ci log tu rtogs pa'o //
T03D3811:302a-9: de sel bar byed pa ni sel bar byed pa'o //
T03D3811:302a-10: de ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di rnams ngo bo nyid
T03D3811:302a-11: gsum 'ga' zhig thams cad dang 'ga' zhig tu phyogs
T03D3811:302a-12: gcig la brten nas bshad par bya'o //
T03D3811:302a-13: gang zhig me tog bkram pa la sogs pa de
T03D3811:302a-14: rnams kyang me tog bzhin du me tog rnams ni
T03D3811:302a-15: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams te /
T03D3811:302a-17: shes pa'i snang ba brdzun pa tsam nyid kyis de
T03D3811:302a-18: rnams nye bar gnas pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis
T03D3811:302a-19: bshad par bya'o // de bzhin du ci srid du
T03D3811:302a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba zhes bya
T03D3811:302a-21: bshad par bya'o // ba'i bar du'o // gang gi
T03D3811:302a-22: stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa na
T03D3811:302a-23: gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gnas gcig tu
T03D3811:302a-25: ting nge 'dzin de dag la zhes bya ba ni
T03D3811:302a-26: rim gyis thams cad la gnas pas ting nge 'dzin
T03D3811:302a-27: tha ma'i yon tan ting nge 'dzin snga ma'i yon
T03D3811:302a-28: tan yongs su mi 'dor bar gnas pa zhes brjod
T03D3811:302a-29: do // phyogs bcu 'di la yod pas na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten no //
T03D3811:302a-30: phyogs bcu la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:302a-31: rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba la
T03D3811:302a-32: rtogs pa ni thogs pa med pa ste de thob
T03D3811:302a-33: pa'o // bslab po zhes bya ba ni bslab pa thob par byed pa'o //
T03D3811:302a-34: des byas pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhig sngar des byas pa'o //
T03D3811:302a-35: zung shig ces bya ba ni sems kyis mi brjed par bya ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3811:302a-36: de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis khyod kyi
T03D3811:302a-37: slad du slar byas pa nye bar gnas pa'i spyod
T03D3811:302a-38: pa byed nus pa zhes gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:302a-39: rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:302b-0: bsnyen bkur gyi phyir ram nye bar gnas @302b pa'i
T03D3811:302b-1: phyir spyod pa'i mchog rnam pa gsum gyis gsungs pa
T03D3811:302b-2: ni / bskal pa gcig gam zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3811:302b-3: de la rnam pa gsum ni dus kyi rab dang
T03D3811:302b-4: lus kyis bsnyen bkur dang bde ba'i dngos po dbul
T03D3811:302b-5: ba las so // de la dus kyi rab bstan pa ni /
T03D3811:302b-6: bskal pa gcig gam zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3811:302b-7: lus kyis bsnyen bkur gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:302b-8: mgo la thod bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:302b-9: thod pa n'i tsee lo na ta ka zhes bya
T03D3811:302b-10: ba'i skad de de la tsee la ni gos ring
T03D3811:302b-11: ba'o // de'i lo na ta ka ni gcig tu
T03D3811:302b-12: bsdus nas ni dkris pa ste mgo la ras kyis
T03D3811:302b-13: dkris pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:302b-14: bde ba'i dngos po dbul ba ni //
T03D3811:302b-15: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3811:302b-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mi snang bar gyur to //
T03D3811:302b-17: de yang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te
T03D3811:302b-18: zhes bya ba ni de rnams cig car nyid du
T03D3811:302b-20: de yang langs zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o //
T03D3811:302b-21: ci ltar bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du bzhugs pa
T03D3811:302b-22: dang me tog gi char yang nam mkha'i dkyil nas
T03D3811:302b-24: gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong
T03D3811:302b-25: ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs
T03D3811:302b-26: pa rnams mthong zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin las
T03D3811:302b-27: ma bzhengs par ci ltar mi snang bar 'gyur /
T03D3811:302b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:302b-29: 'on de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba'i ting nge
T03D3811:302b-30: 'dzin gyi stobs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3811:302b-31: la gnas pa 'dir gnas pa nyid du de bzhin
T03D3811:302b-32: gshegs pa rnams 'dis mthong ba yin te /
T03D3811:302b-33: ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang mi mthong zhes
T03D3811:302b-34: bya ba don 'di gsal ba nyid de de bas
T03D3811:302b-35: na rtogs pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gang
T03D3811:302b-36: nas byon / de dag gang du bzhud ces bya /
T03D3811:302b-38: rang rang gi 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i
T03D3811:302b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
T03D3811:302b-40: nus pas mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na bde na
T03D3811:302b-41: mod kyi 'on kyang sngar bstan pa'i gang de bzhin
T03D3811:302b-42: gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung bar gyur zhes bya
T03D3811:303a-1: gshegs pa rnams kyi sku ni tshogs te de bzhin gshegs pa mang po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:303a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis legs so zhes
T03D3811:303a-4: bya ba ni byin par gyur to zhes bya ba
T03D3811:303a-5: la de yang sngar mthong ba dang 'jig rten gyi
T03D3811:303a-6: khams gzhan na gnas pa zhes bya ba gnyi ga
T03D3811:303a-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams mi snang
T03D3811:303a-10: bar gyur nas zhes bya ba de la yang sngar
T03D3811:303a-11: mdun du mthong ba dang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
T03D3811:303a-12: na gnas pa mthong ba dus mnyam du mi snang
T03D3811:303a-13: ba'o // gang zhig yang de bzhin gshegs pa de
T03D3811:303a-14: rnams gang nas byon gang du bzhud snyam pa'i rtog
T03D3811:303a-15: pa 'di 'ong ba srid pa rnams la de de
T03D3811:303a-16: bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung bar gyur zhes bya ba
T03D3811:303a-17: dang por bstan pa rnams la blta bar bya'o //
T03D3811:303a-18: gdung ba ni mya ngan no //
T03D3811:303a-19: mi dga' ba ni sdug bsngal gyis gnas pa'o //
T03D3811:303a-20: gzungs thob pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3811:303a-25: 'dir yi ge rnams thams cad bsgoms par gyur pa rnams chos thams cad rtogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:303a-27: yi ge aa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste gdod nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:303a-28: de ltar na yi ge de dang de la brten
T03D3811:303a-29: nas chos thams cad la so sor rtog par byed
T03D3811:303a-30: par gyur pa dang skye bar gyur pa la dran
T03D3811:303a-31: pa dang shes rab dag de'i don du 'dzin pa'i
T03D3811:303a-33: de gzungs kyi rgyu las skye ba yin te 'di
T03D3811:303a-34: ni chos thams cad kyi don dam pa la dmigs
T03D3811:303a-35: pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:303a-36: dran pa dang shes rab de dag bzod pa'i gzungs zhes brjod do //
T03D3811:303a-37: yang yi ge rnams de nyid 'bad pa thams cad
T03D3811:303a-38: kyis yang dag par goms par sangs rgyas dang byang
T03D3811:303a-39: chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rgyun mi 'chad par shin
T03D3811:303a-40: tu myur bar chos kyi rgyun dang de'i don rnams
T03D3811:303a-41: ston par gyur ba dag la yang dag par 'dzin
T03D3811:303a-42: pa la rgyu mtshan du gyur pa ming gi tshogs
T03D3811:303a-43: dang tshig gi tshogs dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams la
T03D3811:303b-0: shin tu @303b goms pa nyid kyis yang dag par
T03D3811:303b-1: 'dzin pa la rgyur gyur pa de bas na dran
T03D3811:303b-2: pa dang shes rab dag de nyid chos kyi gzungs
T03D3811:303b-3: dang don gyi gzungs zhes brjod do //
T03D3811:303b-4: slar yang byang chub sems dpas de nyid yi ge
T03D3811:303b-5: rnams yang dag par bsgom pa yid bzhin gyi nor
T03D3811:303b-6: bu ltar dngos po thams cad star bar gyur pa
T03D3811:303b-7: 'di lta ste / smon lam gyi stobs kyis de
T03D3811:303b-8: rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis nye bar
T03D3811:303b-9: 'tshe ba la sogs pa thams cad rnam par 'jig
T03D3811:303b-10: pa'i don dang sdig pa thams cad zad pa'i don
T03D3811:303b-11: du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dgos pas byin
T03D3811:303b-12: gyis brlabs pa don thams cad sgrub par byed par
T03D3811:303b-13: 'gyur ba de'i tshe de brten pa'i ye shes ni
T03D3811:303b-14: sngags kyi gzungs zhes bya bar brjod do //
T03D3811:303b-15: gzungs de dmigs par 'gyur bas yi ge rnams kyang gzungs kyi sgras brjod do //
T03D3811:303b-16: man zhes bya ba ni yid de shes pa la'o //
T03D3811:303b-17: tram zhes bya ba ni skyob pa la ste /
T03D3811:303b-18: yid skyob pas na man tra te zhes bya ba'i ye shes so //
T03D3811:303b-19: snying rje yang sngags kyi sgras brjod do //
T03D3811:303b-20: de dag gi rgyu mthun pa'i phyir de'i yi ge
T03D3811:303b-21: rnams kyang sngags zhes brjod de rnam pa thams cad
T03D3811:303b-22: mkhyen pa nyid kyi go 'phang gi gnas yin pa'i
T03D3811:303b-23: phyir tshig rnams zhes brjod do //
T03D3811:303b-24: de bas na gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig ces ming thob pa'o //
T03D3811:303b-25: de la bzod pa'i gzungs ni yang dag par yongs
T03D3811:303b-26: su rdzogs pa'i mos pas spyod pa'i sa la mngon
T03D3811:303b-27: par brtson pa'i stobs kyis skye ba yin no //
T03D3811:303b-28: gzungs lhag ma gsum po ni smon lam gyi stobs las skye ba yin no //
T03D3811:303b-29: sa dang po la ni chung ngur gyur pa ste
T03D3811:303b-30: gong ma gong ma'i sa rnams la gzungs rnams thams
T03D3811:303b-31: cad kyang gong ma gong ma'i khyad par gyis 'bring
T03D3811:303b-34: gzungs thob pa zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:303b-35: dga' ba ni mthar phyin pa'i dga' ba'o //
T03D3811:303b-36: dang ba ni yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la sems rnyog pa med pa'o //
T03D3811:303b-37: ri mor byed pa ni de'i yon tan rnams la ngo mtshar ba'o //
T03D3811:303b-38: gus par bya ba ni mngon par mchod pa'o //
T03D3811:303b-39: bdag 'di bzhin du zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i yo byad med par ro //
T03D3811:303b-40: bdag gi lus btsongs la zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:304a-0: gal te yang ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i phyir rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang yo byad skyed @304a * //
T03D3811:304a-1: pa la 'di nus pa de lta na yang lus
T03D3811:304a-2: dang srog la mi ltos pa nyid kyis tshogs shin
T03D3811:304a-3: tu 'phel ba'i don du 'di ltar bsam par 'gyur
T03D3811:304a-4: ro // de nyid kyi phyir nyo ba'i bya ba'i
T03D3811:304a-5: khyad par gtan du ba bdag skad cig ma gcig
T03D3811:304a-6: gis byed nus pa gang gis bdag nyid kyang gzhan
T03D3811:304a-7: gyi dbang du gyur pa nyid kyis thos pa'i bar
T03D3811:304a-8: chad du 'gyur ba zhes yang dag par bsam par
T03D3811:304a-9: ro // mi byed do // zhig cing zhes bya
T03D3811:304a-10: ba ni yan lag cig shos zhig pa'i phyir ro
T03D3811:304a-11: ro // mi byed do // // zad pa ni bsrabs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:304a-12: 'gags pa ni shi ba'i mthar thug pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:304a-13: btsongs pa ni 'bangs la sogs pa'i ngo bor ro //
T03D3811:304a-14: 'di ni don med pa'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:304a-15: 'dod pa'i rgyu dang zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:304a-17: 'dod pa'i gzhi zhes bya ba ni brgyud nas so //
T03D3811:304a-18: sgra zhes bya ba ste khyad par gzhan gyis gsal bar byed pa ni /
T03D3811:304a-19: sgra bsgrags shing zhes bya ba ste shin tu che ba'i sgra ni skad do //
T03D3811:304a-21: gsungs pa ni mi su 'dod ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3811:304a-22: nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyi zhes bya ba ni 'dir thung ba mi 'byung ngo //
T03D3811:304a-23: sems la chags pa dang bral ba'am zhes bya ba
T03D3811:304a-24: 'di la 'am gyi sgra rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir
T03D3811:304a-25: dang rnam par bshad pa'i rnam par gzhag pa shes
T03D3811:304a-26: pa'i phyir ro // shin tu'i sgra ni 'dir nye ba'i sgra'i don la 'jug go //
T03D3811:304a-27: yul de las zhes bya ba lnga pa rigs par 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:304a-28: gang gi sgra ni de'i phyir gyi don la'o //
T03D3811:304a-29: de ltar yongs su bsgribs so zhes bya ba ni rtse gcig par byas pa ma yin pa'o //
T03D3811:304a-30: ci ltar zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir ro //
T03D3811:304a-31: ga la ba der song ste zhes bya ba ni
T03D3811:304a-32: brgya byin gyi bsod nams lhag pa nyid kyis bdud
T03D3811:304a-33: rnams kyis zil gyis mi gnon pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:304a-34: rkang zhes bya ba la mdzdza zhes bya ba'i skad do //
T03D3811:304a-35: de bas na mdzdza zhes bya ba'i sgra la mo rtags la da pa si m'a bzhin du'o //
T03D3811:304a-36: rus pa dang rkang zhes bya ba ni rus pa'i rkang ngo //
T03D3811:304a-37: sems bde ba dang zhes bya ba ni dga' ba de nyid kyis las su rung ba'i sems so //
T03D3811:304a-38: sems rab tu dga' ba ni de las kyang dga' ba nyis 'gyur du yod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:304b-0: bram ze'i khye'u khyod la @304b sbyin no zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:304b-1: 'o na rkang la sogs pa sbyin pas srog zad pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:304b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa la bar chad chen po 'di yod do //
T03D3811:304b-3: de rtag tu ngus ci ltar blangs she na /
T03D3811:304b-4: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te 'di ni de bzhin
T03D3811:304b-5: gshegs pa rnams kyis song shig dang shes rab kyi
T03D3811:304b-6: pha rol tu phyin pa nyon zhes bya ba la
T03D3811:304b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsungs ni 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T03D3811:304b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mthu nyid kyis slar
T03D3811:304b-10: lus yongs su rdzogs pa nyid dang srog 'phrog par
T03D3811:304b-11: byed pa'i na tsha rnams kyis srog la bar chad
T03D3811:304b-12: med par mthong ngo bdag nyid kyi bsod nams kyi
T03D3811:304b-13: mthu yang shes pa dang bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs
T03D3811:304b-15: ji skad du bshad par 'gyur te /
T03D3811:304b-16: bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas
T03D3811:304b-17: 'di la ni lha'i dbang po khyod brtson pa chung
T03D3811:304b-18: bar gyis shig ces bya ba'o //
T03D3811:304b-19: des na 'di nyan par 'dod kyang rus pa dang
T03D3811:304b-20: rkang la sogs pa sbyin pa la yang 'jug go
T03D3811:304b-21: // yon tan gyi rigs zhes bya ba ni mi rnams dang thun mong ba'i yon tan no //
T03D3811:304b-22: yon tan gyi khyad par ni mi rnams las 'das pa'i yon tan no//
T03D3811:304b-23: bzod do zhes bya ba ni rang nyid kyis dngos
T03D3811:304b-24: su byed pa nyid kyis kyang 'dod pa de'i phyir
T03D3811:304b-25: ro // brgya byin gyi dang ba'i khyad par gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:304b-26: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:304b-27: nus pa zhes bya ba ni mthu'o //
T03D3811:304b-28: dgongs pa shes nas gsungs pa ni brtson pa chung
T03D3811:304b-29: bar gyis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa ste
T03D3811:304b-30: / brtson pa zhes bya ba ni rtsom pa'o //
T03D3811:304b-31: skad cig ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:304b-32: dus nyung ba nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir skad cig
T03D3811:304b-33: la sogs pa gsum po la yang rnam grangs su
T03D3811:304b-35: dus nyung ba nye bar mtshon pa nyid bstan pa'i don du gsum nye bar smos pa'o //
T03D3811:304b-36: nad ni nad chen po rnams so //
T03D3811:304b-37: gnod pa ni nad chung ba'o //
T03D3811:304b-38: spobs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'o /
T03D3811:304b-39: rtag tu ngu zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T03D3811:304b-40: lan glan pa zhes bya ba ni lan gyi rgyu mtshan du'o //
T03D3811:305a-0: @305a * // ma skyes nas zhes bya ba ni rnyed par gyur ba ma yin pa'o //
T03D3811:305a-1: bdag la stsol cig ces bya ba la stsol cig ces bya ba ni sbyin pa la'o //
T03D3811:305a-2: rol mo'i cha byad ces bya ba ni rol mo'i rnam pa'o //
T03D3811:305a-3: mang zhing zhes bya ba ni rnam pa mang ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:305a-4: rgya che ba ni rnam pa re rer mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:305a-5: longs spyod ni nor rnams so //
T03D3811:305a-6: rgyas btab nas zhes bya ba ni spong ba srid
T03D3811:305a-7: pas spyod yul gyi ngo bo dgag pa'i don dang
T03D3811:305a-8: dad pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis
T03D3811:305a-9: rnyed par dga' ba nyid kyis mthong ba la sogs
T03D3811:305a-10: pa na gdung ba nyid kyi don du'o //
T03D3811:305a-11: sems can rnams mgu ba la sogs pa'i thabs rdzu 'phrul gyi chos 'phrul bstan pa ni /
T03D3811:305a-12: de dag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:305a-13: spyi bo'i steng na zhes bya ba ni dbu'i steng du'o //
T03D3811:305a-14: zhig tu gyur to zhes bya ba ni rab kyi sgra ste so so'i don la'o //
T03D3811:305a-15: nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni bar snang la'o //
T03D3811:305a-16: rdzu 'phrul che zhing zhes bya ba ni sems mngon
T03D3811:305a-17: par 'du byas pa nyid kyis de lta bu'i rdzu
T03D3811:305a-19: mthu che zhing zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul mdzad
T03D3811:305a-20: pa la bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis chud mi
T03D3811:305a-22: gzi brjid che ba zhes bya ba ni mu stegs
T03D3811:305a-23: dang bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis de'i phyogs su
T03D3811:305a-24: nye bar mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:305a-25: thal mo sbyar te zhes bya ba ni thal mo sbyar bas na thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T03D3811:305a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byon pa dang bzhud
T03D3811:305a-27: pa dri ba'i gnas skabs su brtsams pa'i don du
T03D3811:305a-28: rang gi gtam brjod cing gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:305a-29: rigs kyi bu 'di na bdag ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:305a-30: rigs kyi bu zhes bya bas bos pa nyid kyis
T03D3811:305a-31: 'phags pa chos 'phags dge slong gi sdom pa la
T03D3811:305a-32: gnas pa ma yin te gzhan du na btsun pa
T03D3811:305a-33: zhes bya bas bos par 'gyur ro //
T03D3811:305a-34: khyad par gyur nas zhes bya ba ni thob pa'o //
T03D3811:305a-35: mthong ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i
T03D3811:305a-36: rgyu las mthong ba dang lhan cig nyid du zhes
T03D3811:305a-38: rtag tu dus nye bar mtshon pa'i le'u ni rtag tu du'i le'u ste le'u sum cu pa'o /
T03D3811:305a-40: // / gzugs kyi sku la de bzhin gshegs par 'dzin pa dgag pa'i don du gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:305a-41: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:305b-0: gal @305b te byon pa dang bzhud pa dang ldan
T03D3811:305b-1: pa'i gzugs kyi sku de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin
T03D3811:305b-2: na 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin zhes
T03D3811:305b-3: bya ba 'di dgos pa la de bzhin nyid kyi
T03D3811:305b-4: ngo bo nyid chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid can don
T03D3811:305b-5: dam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:305b-6: de bzhin nyid las ma g-yos te /
T03D3811:305b-7: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:305b-8: 'dis de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pas bsdus pa'i
T03D3811:305b-9: phyir rtag pa'i mtshan nyid chos kyi sku zhes bstan
T03D3811:305b-10: to // de yang rnam par byang ba'i cha can
T03D3811:305b-11: gzhan dbang gi ngo bo nyid yongs su 'gyur bas
T03D3811:305b-12: rnyed par bya ba zhes bya ba'i skye ba dogs
T03D3811:305b-13: pa la skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid 'di'i gsungs
T03D3811:305b-14: to // pa ni / mi skye ba gang yin
T03D3811:305b-15: pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'o
T03D3811:305b-16: to // pa ni / // me long dang mnyam
T03D3811:305b-17: pa nyid dang so sor rtog pa dang bya ba
T03D3811:305b-18: grub pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i mtshan nyid 'di
T03D3811:305b-20: yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3811:305b-21: don ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3811:305b-22: can rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongs su gyur
T03D3811:305b-23: pa'i slad du gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de
T03D3811:305b-25: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:305b-26: kun brtags dang gzhan dbang med pa'i ngo bos spyod
T03D3811:305b-27: pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa dang don dam par
T03D3811:305b-28: yod pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi
T03D3811:305b-29: ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no
T03D3811:305b-30: // so so rang gis rig par bya'i mtshan nyid de'i go skabs su byed cing gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:305b-31: ci lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:305b-32: ci lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa ni 'dir ci lta ba nyid do //
T03D3811:305b-33: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid 'di'i go skabs su byed cing gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:305b-34: 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes bya ba ste ;
T03D3811:305b-35: las mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ston cing gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:305b-36: 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:305b-37: las mngon par 'dus byas pa dag pa ni 'dir 'gog pa'o //
T03D3811:306a-0: khyab par byed pa nyid dang rtogs par bya dka' @306a * //
T03D3811:306a-1: pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de de la go skabs su byed cing gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:306a-2: nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:306a-3: 'o na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
T03D3811:306a-4: gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes pa'i
T03D3811:306a-5: sku de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T03D3811:306a-6: slar de bzhin nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa ni /
T03D3811:306a-7: rigs kyi bu chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan na med de zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:306a-8: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
T03D3811:306a-9: gang gi phyir de de rnams kyi don dam pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:306a-10: de ltar de bzhin nyid la sogs pa dang de
T03D3811:306a-11: bzhin gshegs pa dag la tha mi dad pa brjod
T03D3811:306a-12: nas shin tu tha mi dad pa bstan pa'i phyir
T03D3811:306a-13: gsungs pa ni / rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag
T03D3811:306a-14: gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang zhes bya
T03D3811:306a-15: gsungs pa ni / ba ste / chos 'di dag
T03D3811:306a-16: gi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid la sogs
T03D3811:306a-17: gsungs pa ni / ba ste / pa rnams kyi'o
T03D3811:306a-18: // de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang zhes bya
T03D3811:306a-19: ba ni kun brtags kyi ngo bos stong pa nyid
T03D3811:306a-20: de kun brtags kyi ngo bos de bzhin nyid kyang
T03D3811:306a-21: don dam pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:306a-22: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
T03D3811:306a-23: zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams la sogs
T03D3811:306a-24: pa rnams kyi'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
T03D3811:306a-25: nyid gang yin pa 'di dag ni de bzhin nyid
T03D3811:306a-26: gcig pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas mdor
T03D3811:306a-27: pa rnams kyi'o // bstan pa'o // gtan tshigs gsungs pa ni med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:306a-28: rdzas su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:306a-29: don dam par yod pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis med pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
T03D3811:306a-30: da ni gzugs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin
T03D3811:306a-31: zhes bya ba gang zhig shugs kyis gsungs pa de
T03D3811:306a-32: la gzhan dbang gi ngo bo'i med pa nyid dpes
T03D3811:306a-33: gsungs pa ni / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3811:306a-34: nyi ma gung gi dus la zhes bya ba ni yang dag par 'ongs pas na dus so //
T03D3811:306a-35: nyi ma gung gi dus 'di gang yin zhe na /
T03D3811:306b-0: nyi ma gung @306b gi dus la 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3811:306b-1: byis pa'i rang bzhin can ni de ma yin pa la de'i blo yod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:306b-2: shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can ni //
T03D3811:306b-3: de'i blo yod de yongs su mi 'dor ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3811:306b-4: de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag de
T03D3811:306b-5: bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam sgrar mngon par chags
T03D3811:306b-6: pa de dag ni zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:306b-7: bi sha ste zhes bya ba'i khams kyi don la
T03D3811:306b-8: 'gro ba'i khyad par yin pa'i phyir byed pa po
T03D3811:306b-9: la kta'o // dper na grong khyer du zhugs pa zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
T03D3811:306b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3811:306b-11: 'di rnams kyi chos kyi sku yod pas na chos kyi sku'o //
T03D3811:306b-12: yang na chos nyid ni de bzhin nyid do //

T03D3811:319b-6: gus byas 'di ni bsrung bya ba thal sbyar bdag

T03D3811:319b-9: gang gi kun nas rtsod pa rnams la pha rol phyogs kyi mtha'i //
T03D3811:319b-10: lto ba khengs pa brjod pa'i me 'di rab tu 'bar ba yin //
T03D3811:319b-11: drang srong min pa'i bshad pa'i 'dam rdzab shin tu chen po las //
T03D3811:319b-12: rgyal ba rnams ni skyed mdzad zhi ba 'byung gnas kyis ni gdon par byas //
T03D3811:319b-13: rtog ge drug kyang shes shing rig byed kyis rtsub
T03D3811:319b-14: bram ze rnams dang rtsod pa las ni rnam par
T03D3811:319b-15: rgyal // snyan dang gas dam pa brtsams pa'i yon
T03D3811:319b-16: tan 'di rnams kyis ni skabs su gyur la 'bras
T03D3811:319b-18: gal te sde snod gsum la goms pa gang gi
T03D3811:319b-19: tshe na rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yum gsum la yang
T03D3811:319b-20: ni // thogs med pa ni pha rol phyin tshul
T03D3811:319b-21: gal te gang du 'phags pa klu sgrub bzhed pa
T03D3811:319b-22: ni // yang // bdag cag gis ni blo yis
T03D3811:319b-23: byas pa'i ngo mtshar rnams kyis rig pa rnams la
T03D3811:319b-25: gang dang gang du yang ni gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi yang bde bar grogs po rnams ni rnyed //
T03D3811:319b-26: srid pa gzhan yang rgya che ba la 'bad pa
T03D3811:319b-27: chen po rnams kyis blo dang ldan par byas pa
T03D3811:319b-28: ni // gcig gam gnyis kyang min te yongs su
T03D3811:319b-29: log nyid kyis kyang nang gi bdag nyid rig pa
T03D3811:319b-30: ni // shes pa rnams // bdag gi bshad pa
T03D3811:319b-31: yang dag don gyis bsdus la gang zhig mi gus
T03D3811:319b-32: ni // shes pa rnams // pa ; / nga
T03D3811:319b-33: rgyal gyis ni skye bo ngan pa sun dbyung bar
T03D3811:319b-35: glang chen gtso bo'i mche ba gnyis ni bsnyon chu'i thigs pa sna tshogs can //
T03D3811:319b-36: su zhig gis ni lag pa'i stobs kyis kun nas gdon par yang ni nus //
T03D3811:319b-37: dpung rgyan dang ni gdu bu gtor cig dbang phyug chen pos reg pa'i gor ma 'dren byed pa //
T03D3811:319b-38: blon po gser gyi 'od kyis bslus pa tha dad
T03D3811:319b-39: du ma rnams kyis dor bar ma byed cig /
T03D3811:319b-40: dka' thub drag po rnams ni byas nas lha rnams
T03D3811:319b-41: bsten zhing gang zhig 'di ni sgrub byed pa //
T03D3811:319b-42: gang gis reg pas kyang ni lcags kyi phung po gser du bsgyur bas ngo mtshar don du 'byung //
T03D3811:320a-0: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di bshad pas ni @320a * //
T03D3811:320a-2: dpal ldan rdo rje gdan dang nye bar gang tshe 'dir ni mgon po byams pa rang nyid kyis //
T03D3811:320a-3: skyes bu khyu mchog n'a ga ge sar gsar pa'i shing gi grib ma rnams la ngal bso nas //
T03D3811:320a-4: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ni smon lam byas nas
T03D3811:320a-5: de tshe nges par byang chub thob gyur cig /
T03D3811:320a-6: mi yi dbang pos brten cing btud pa'i phyags mas
T03D3811:320a-7: phyag dar legs par byas pa de yis ni //
T03D3811:320a-8: zhabs dang nye ba'i pad ma'i rdul ni ring por bskrad pas sdang ba med la 'tsho ba po //
T03D3811:320a-9: mi yi bdag po r'a ma p'a las sa skyong mdzad pa'i gnas kyi mu tig phreng ba ni //
T03D3811:320a-10: dpal ldan rgyal po dza gad ta lar gnas par byed pa bdag gis rnam bshad 'di byas so //
T03D3811:320a-11: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha
T03D3811:320a-12: rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i rnam par bshad
T03D3811:320a-13: pa man ngag gi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya
T03D3811:320a-15: /'di'i gzhung tshad ni sha lo ka stong phrag brgyad do //
T03D3811:320a-16: dpal ldan nga rgyal skyong gis rgyal srid mdzad pa'i
T03D3811:320a-17: lo bdun pa la dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes bzhi
T03D3811:320a-18: la dpal byang chub chen po'i lha khang du bris
T03D3811:320a-19: pa'o // rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa lang+ka ka de ba dang /
T03D3811:320a-20: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims 'byung
T03D3811:320a-21: gnas kyis dpal sgye'u ri'i drung du chos skor dben
T03D3811:320a-22: pa'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o //
T03D3811:320a-23: sde snod gsum ni 'dzin byed pa /
T03D3811:320a-24: gnyal gyi bri lha na bzhugs pa'i //
T03D3811:320a-25: dge bshes blo gros 'byung gnas kyis //
T03D3811:320a-26: zhu phul yon bdag mdzad nas ni //
T03D3811:320a-27: dngos cag lo pan rnam gnyis kyis //
T03D3811:320a-28: rnam bshad 'di ni bsgyur pa yin //
T03D3811:320a-29: bsod nams 'di yis dus ni thams cad du //
T03D3811:320a-30: mchog gi sems can theg pa chen po'i rigs //
T03D3811:320a-31: 'jig rten pa yi sdug bsngal sel nus shing //
T03D3811:320a-32: nad med rnam par 'tshe med 'byung gyur cig /
T03D3811:320a-33: sh'akya'i dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas sbas pa'i theg
T03D3811:320a-34: pa mchog gi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi sbyin
T03D3811:320a-35: pa las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa 'dis
T03D3811:320a-36: mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang /
T03D3811:320a-37: pha dang ma sngon bu 'gro bar byas pa'i sems
T03D3811:320a-38: can gyi phung bo ma lus pas bla na med
T03D3811:320a-39: pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i rgyur gyur
T03D3811:320a-40: cig /'grel pa 'di rting pa lo ts'a bas snga
T03D3811:320a-41: mor bsgyur yang phyis gzhan la ma 'phel bas /
T03D3811:320a-42: sngar dpe phyi ma rnyed pa las phyis bla ma
T03D3811:320a-43: chos kyi rgyal po'i phyag dpe rgya yig gi nang
